story:
Reading is Resistance: help Restless Books champion diversity, immigrant culture, global voices, and great books—when we need them most!

Restless Books is a newly nonprofit, independent publisher devoted to stories that speak to us across linguistic and cultural borders. In a few short years, we’ve published celebrated English editions of eye-opening work from places as diverse as Cuba, Malaysia, Madagascar, Iceland, Pakistan, Brazil, the United Arab Emirates, Mexico, Russia, Israel, and many more. In 2015, we launched the Restless Books Prize for New Immigrant Writing to celebrate the rich contributions to culture immigrants make. And now, at a time when anti-global, anti-diversity, anti-literary forces are growing, we are determined to resist—by amplifying voices that are suppressed or neglected and expanding our understanding of the world through fearless international publishing. Your help is essential in keeping the reading resistance strong!

 

 

We need your help to become a sustainable nonprofit

At the turn of 2017, Restless solidified our longstanding commitment to immigrant culture and diverse global literature by becoming a nonprofit. That status allows us to make new connections among authors, readers, and patrons of the arts. It means we can prioritize literary excellence and our global ethos over the dictates of the market. Nonprofit funding, however, takes time to develop, and in the meantime, we need your help.

Many of our indie publishing heroes have found success under a nonprofit model, such as Graywolf Press, The New Press, Archipelago Books, and Coffee House Press. These publishers have cyclical fundraising through government and corporate grants, foundation support, and individual donors. Restless is now incorporated as a nonprofit at the state level and we are awaiting 501(c)3 status from the IRS, which will allow us to apply for more grants and accept tax-deductible gifts. To tide us over during the four to six months the application takes to process, we’ve turned to Indiegogo to reach readers directly and sidestep the red tape while our own fundraising cycle kicks into gear.  

 

Your support will make a real impact!

Your contribution will support phenomenal international authors and translators and help them connect them with readers eager to hear their voices. You'll benefit some exciting new and ongoing projects as well:

  • Continuing the Restless Books Prize for New Immigrant Writing
  • Expanding our series of The Face, Restless Classics, and international science fiction
  • Extending our line of international Jewish literature
  • Launching our new imprint of international books for young readers, Yonder

Think of the last time you discovered something wonderful, surprising, eye-opening, or even life-changing on the page. You can help recreate that experience for countless others by helping Restless Books thrive. Come on and join the reading resistance!

 

The economics

Until we find the next Elena Ferrante, Roberto Bolaño, or Karl Ove Knausgaard, we're operating on a relatively small scale, which presents its own challenges. Smaller print runs are more expensive per-copy to produce and yield modest revenue. On the indie scale, even books that sell out their print runs end up breaking even. With nonprofit funding, we can ensure authors, translators, and staff are properly compensated, and we can continue to take editorial risks and publish creatively and ambitiously. 

 

What you get

In addition to earning our undying gratitude and the tremendous feeling of supporting international authors and translators, every supporter of our Indiegogo campaign will get a shout-out on a special page of our website. And we've got some other fun ways of saying thank you....

 

Reading is Resistance swag—choose from two logos

 

 

Signed books from one-of-a-kind authors

Yoss: rock star of Cuban Science Fiction

 

Alejandro Jodorowsky: legendary filmmaker, Tarot master, spiritual guru, and novelist

 

Oddny Eir: a Björk collaborator's erotic and philosophical autofiction

 

Copies of The Face—signed for you personally by the author!

 

Ruth Ozeki

 

Chris Abani

 

Tash Aw

 

International Jewish fiction hardcover set

 

Together we can make it happen!

In our few years of learning and growing, our “restless” energy has brought our small publishing operation some full-sized success and accolades:

The Wall Street Journal named György Spiró’s Captivity one of the 10 Best Fiction Books of 2015

Yoram Kaniuk’s Between Life and Death was a finalist for the PEN Translation Prize

Deepak Unnikrishnan’s Temporary People was named a top-ten summer book club pick by the American Bookseller Association

Alejandro Jodorowsky’s Where the Bird Sings Best was named one of the Best Books of 2015 by NPR

Tash Aw’s The Face was excerpted in The New Yorker and named a finalist for the Los Angeles Times Christopher Isherwood Prize for Autobiographical Prose

Cuban science fiction author Yoss was profiled in The New York Times

With your help, there will be so much more great bookish things to come. 

 

Other ways you can help

 

Read the books:

Visit our bookstore for the latest and greatest international reads.

 

Spread the word:

Tell your friends, share the campaign, tweet, post, instagram, blog, shout, dance, etc!

 

Stay tuned:

Sign up for our Newsletter, follow us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram, and check out our blog for updates.

story:
Are you shocked about this message?! 

We are shocked too!


Jesus is not the Jesus you think. And this image is just a mockup for sure!
But it is even a true mockup! A mockup telling the story of the Jesus we mean!

Jesus is a great guy.
A guy who works as a gardener in the community where we take holidays in california!
Jesus is 36, a loving father, a caring husband, a great worker, a nice person, even a amazing guy!
But Donald, or like we call him "the Don" or "DonKingKong from New York", want to ban him from the United States. Because he is mexican!
This is just one reason why we created this campaign!

Please check it out!





What is the i.Donald ?
 

The i.Donald is:
 

 
the first politically correct smartwatch!

 
the first wearable apologizing device!

 
the most democratic smartwatch in the world!

 
the first anti racism smart device!

 
a distant early warning system which warns you when Donald is near!  

 
a navigation device which helps you to find routes away from Donald!

 
a smart device against border walls!

 
a clear mark against misogyny!

 
a clear mark for human rights!

 
a smartwatch which makes America GREAT, with each sale again & again...

 
a reach out for the future of our children!

 

 



 


Who needs the iDonald?


 
Mexicans and any other ethnics who were offended by Donald!

 
CNN and any other offended press employees, because Donald says: "you are the worst!"

 
Mothers with crying babies, because Donald "dont like to be interrupted!"

 
Taxi drivers, because Donald says:
"you are the reason there is too much traffic on our streets!"​

 
Currently and Ex employees of Donald,
because you can share your sorrow with other people!

 
all Americans and people around the world don`t want to accept,
that Donald has the presidential power!

 
all people around the world don`t want,
Donald take control over the US military and the nuclear arsenal!

 
all people around the world don`t want,
a person like Donald to take control over one of the largest economies in the world!

 
all people around the world want the USA to be an open and anti racism state!

 
even all people who are fighting for the future of our children!

 




 


Let`s have a look in the i.Donald!


   

   

   

   

 

 

 



Let`s have a look to the i.Donald hardware!

 

 

 

 

 






 

BIG BIG Questions


I am not a US citizen, why i need the iDonald?

The united states of america are one of the largest economies in the world.
The united states of america are a reliable country against terror.
The united states of america is a global player!
For sure any system has it`s faults!
But this is human! Humans also have faults!
But think for a moment, and ask yourself:

"Do you want a uncontrollable person like the Donald in a powerful position like the US President?
Do you want to give him the power over one of the largest and highest developed military in the world?
Do you want to give him access to the nuclear arsenal and the nuclear weapon codes?
Do you want to have a US president who offends each one he does not like?
Do you want a person as US president who destroys decades of political and people`s work?
Do you want an america where the racism and hating are growing day by day?"

NOBODY can want this!!!

50% of our team are not US citizen!
But we want to take care that Donald does not enter the white house!
Because this voting will have impacts for all nations around the world!

 


Why the iDonald is more than a smartwatch ?

The iDonald is not only a smartwatch and an APP.
The iDonald is a message!
A reach out for human rights!
A sidestick walk to the offended people!
A statement for respect and humanity!
A Community which shares one Dream: "STOP THE DONALD"!

 

 

Who creates the iDonald ?

We are a team, friends, who comes from different places in the world!
We are just a few of the millions of people around the world who are fighting and praying against Donald!

We are pretty sure that when Donald enters the white house, after our campaign, we will never have to try to enter the united states of america, or try to launch a company there.
Because the Donald will fight against all his enemies!
But anyway: We can not sell our humanity, our minds or personality and put our hands in our pockets!

The game is first over when it is over! 

 

 



 


Celebreties & People we like!
 

The message of this campaign and the iDonald is supported by the fellow, celebreties and people. We love them all!
Because these people support the world with fighting against Donald!
Please follow them on social media, support their work, share their messages and honor their fight against Donald.
These people are really awesome on her fight against Donald!

 

Hillary Clinton  
Barack Obama 
President of the United States of america <POTUS>
Bernie Sanders
Bill de Blasio 
Mitt Romney

story:
Help get my most important book published.

 

Summary

In his book Days of Rage, historian Bryan Burrough called him, “the essential blueprint for almost every radical organization throughout the 1970s.” He was the first US radical to target large office buildings and he has been called a leader of the famous uprising at Attica.

I simply called him "Dad."

My name is Joshua Melville. I'm a professional writer of five industry trade books, over 100 published articles, award winning filmmaker, lecturer and artists' rights activist. Sam Melville was my father.

Sam & Josh Melville

In 1969 he and his collective were the inspiration for the Weather Underground when they set off explosives in numerous New York City institutions with Vietnam War interests:

  • The Whitehall Army Induction Center
  • Major Banks
  • Standard Oil
  • Over a dozen others 

By design, no one was killed. These were protests.  Not attacks.  And the anti-war movement responded with applause.

But the threat to the Establishment War Machine was undeniable.  In a effort to quash his campaign, a massive FBI manhunt was put in place to capture the man they labeled, "the Mad Bomber."

Rather than be treated as a political prisoner, Sam Melville, an educated engineer, who helped design landmarks like Brooklyn City Hall and Lincoln Center was arrested, charged like a common criminal and sent to Attica State Penitentiary. There prisoners received one roll of toilet paper a month; one shower every ten days; and spent months in solitary, denied the right to speak with anyone from the outside world.

Sam Melville arrested

After numerous petitions to New York’s Governor Nelson Rockefeller, on September 9th, 1971 Sam Melville, along with a group of inmates from the Nation of Islam, Young Lords and the Black Panthers, obliterated racial boundaries and united to lead Attica inmates into the biggest prison uprising in U.S. history.

Attica State Prison uprising - 1971

My father was killed when state troopers, armed with shotguns and rifles, lined the catwalks of Attica and fired down into the prison yard like shooting fish in a barrel.

The Retaking of Attica 1971

Rumors of my father’s assassination were born immediately, making Sam Melville a household name. A book of his correspondence, Letters from Attica, was published posthumously (and is still used by educators of prison reform); memorials were set up in his honor; noted leftist lawyer William Kunstler delivered his eulogy; Black Panthers guarded his remains at a three day memorial attended by radical royalty; children were named after him.

To many on the Left, he was a revolutionary hero. To others on the Right, a misguided anarchist. But neither template jibed with the man I remember. 

In my 20s I became determined to learn everything I could about my father and to answer a single question…

What could turn a gentle man,

a musician and a poet,

into a bomber?

I got far more than I bargained for.

After twenty-five years of personal research, I've uncovered never-before known facts about the birth of the Radical Left of the 1960s, the FBI’s efforts to quash the Peace Movement and the truth behind the bloody retaking of Attica State Penitentiary.

I'm putting everything I've learned into my 6th book, American Timebomb so that now the public will also know the truth.

This book will inspire compelling conversations in the media about:

  • What is the fundamental difference between radicalism and terrorism?
  • How do the children of radicals suffer for their parents’ choices?
  • Is the FBI culpable in the escalation of US radicalism/terrorism via their covert agent/provocateur program?
  • Was bloodshed at Attica necessary?

American Timebomb will answer important questions about the radical 1960s and Attica that have lingered for over four decades and in the process deliver a historical narrative non-fiction and an emotionally gripping father/son story of family betrayal at its heart.

Sam Melville - 1965                                  Joshua Melville - 1983

For more information on Sam Melville, please visit his memorial website www.SamMelville.org

Contra-Diction

I think Sam was relieved

to have died without killing anyone.

A gentle man, he once agreed that he would be pleased

to spend his life disturbing not one blade of grass.

And yet, once he said that some of us are only good

for the destructive phase and will not be useful for the re-building.

And he meant himself.

I once asked him what he would do after the Revolution.

“Blow things up,” he said,

And I imagined him blowing up

lily pads

in heaven.

--Sharon Krebs, 1975

Melville conspirator, Poet, Radical, Bomber, Weatherman, Mother

About the Book

American Timebomb will be a hardcover run of approximately 135,000 words.  (450-500 pages). The book will be composed of nine parts, an index and appendices that will include exclusive photos of Sam, Attica, and FBI documents released for the first time.  The hardcover will retail for approximately $45, paperback for $23 and digital version for $16.

This is what our finished book might look like.

Half of the book is currently completed and anticipated delivery of a completed draft is mid-2017.

Read a live working draft of American Timebomb:

Desclaimer: These are rough drafts and contain errors.

Joshua's Story - At age 11, Joshua learns that the father he’s been missing for years has in fact been killed in history’s largest prison uprising, Attica and that he was in prison for terrorism.

Sam's Story - Sam must choose between his morals and his ideology when being a father comes in conflict with an opportunity to lead a bleeding edge of radicals in the cultural revolution of the 1960s.

 

"Every prisoner in America is a political prisoner"

-  Sam Melville Attica 1971

 

What We Need

We've already put much of our own resources into the project. Now we need to raise about $60,000 to get this to major bookstores.  This number comes from adding the costs of Goal 1 together with Goal 2.  See the charts below.

The combined costs of finishing the manuscript (GOAL 1) are $14,600. These are for things that are out of our reach such as:

  • Editorial services
  • Fact checking
  • Photo clearances
  • Book Packaging and Production Services
  • E&O insurance.

For example the FBI files that are supposed to be free through the Freedom of Information Act actually required the hiring of lawyers to see in a form that was unredacted.  We've spent years amassing the pages necessary to tell this story.  Over 10,000 of them.

GOAL 2

Then comes GOAL 2, sometimes called a "stretch goal."  These are the costs for manufacturing, marketing and distribution.  If we can raise these amounts we will not need a publishing partner to make this book a hardcover in major bookstores. 

The chart below shows a common break-even point for books of this type-- 1000 units. 

Combining both goals and the fees and commissions associated with the Indiegogo campaign we arrive at a total of $62,000.

Other Ways You Can Help 

You may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Follow and re-tweet content from the Twitter account @AMTimebomb

Do the same for the Facebook account Sam Melville

"Every prisoner in America is a political prisoner." Sam Melville, 1970 Attica
story_txt:
Help get my most important book published. SummaryIn his book Days of Rage, historian Bryan Burrough called him, “the essential blueprint for almost every radical organization throughout the 1970s.” He was the first US radical to target large office buildings and he has been called a leader of the famous uprising at Attica.I simply called him "Dad."My name is Joshua Melville. I'm a professional writer of five industry trade books, over 100 published articles, award winning filmmaker, lecturer and artists' rights activist. Sam Melville was my father.Sam & Josh MelvilleIn 1969 he and his collective were the inspiration for the Weather Underground when they set off explosives in numerous New York City institutions with Vietnam War interests:
The Whitehall Army Induction Center
Major Banks
Standard Oil
Over a dozen others 
By design, no one was killed. These were protests.  Not attacks.  And the anti-war movement responded with applause.But the threat to the Establishment War Machine was undeniable.  In a effort to quash his campaign, a massive FBI manhunt was put in place to capture the man they labeled, "the Mad Bomber."Rather than be treated as a political prisoner, Sam Melville, an educated engineer, who helped design landmarks like Brooklyn City Hall and Lincoln Center was arrested, charged like a common criminal and sent to Attica State Penitentiary. There prisoners received one roll of toilet paper a month; one shower every ten days; and spent months in solitary, denied the right to speak with anyone from the outside world.Sam Melville arrestedAfter numerous petitions to New York’s Governor Nelson Rockefeller, on September 9th, 1971 Sam Melville, along with a group of inmates from the Nation of Islam, Young Lords and the Black Panthers, obliterated racial boundaries and united to lead Attica inmates into the biggest prison uprising in U.S. history.Attica State Prison uprising - 1971My father was killed when state troopers, armed with shotguns and rifles, lined the catwalks of Attica and fired down into the prison yard like shooting fish in a barrel.The Retaking of Attica 1971Rumors of my father’s assassination were born immediately, making Sam Melville a household name. A book of his correspondence, Letters from Attica, was published posthumously (and is still used by educators of prison reform); memorials were set up in his honor; noted leftist lawyer William Kunstler delivered his eulogy; Black Panthers guarded his remains at a three day memorial attended by radical royalty; children were named after him.To many on the Left, he was a revolutionary hero. To others on the Right, a misguided anarchist. But neither template jibed with the man I remember. In my 20s I became determined to learn everything I could about my father and to answer a single question…What could turn a gentle man,a musician and a poet,into a bomber?I got far more than I bargained for.After twenty-five years of personal research, I've uncovered never-before known facts about the birth of the Radical Left of the 1960s, the FBI’s efforts to quash the Peace Movement and the truth behind the bloody retaking of Attica State Penitentiary.I'm putting everything I've learned into my 6th book, American Timebomb so that now the public will also know the truth.This book will inspire compelling conversations in the media about:
What is the fundamental difference between radicalism and terrorism?
How do the children of radicals suffer for their parents’ choices?
Is the FBI culpable in the escalation of US radicalism/terrorism via their covert agent/provocateur program?
Was bloodshed at Attica necessary?

story:
"I consider this project to be to be, quite literally, my life saver. The project has only reached his stage with a ton of unselfish help from my friends and ex-colleagues from business. Their efforts ranged notably from capable ‘pro bono’ work in marketing and strategy to funding my manuscripts and art.

My friends and I sincerely believe this project will enjoy great success! Now, with their funds exhausted, I need help from the wider public to break through with this project.

See below what we offer... Please also read my own tragic story at the very end of this appeal."

Norbert Voss

 

'13 Sensual Confessions’ is a creative, winning concept primed and ready for your funding: Entertaining, erotic tales illustrated by a contemporary artist working closely with an intuitive author to capture the true essence of what has passed, or what is destined to come to pass!

Captured are true-life romantic episodes and experiences of so-called ‘Muses’, women that have opened their hearts, no, their very souls, and shared their sensual secrets with the author, Norbert Voss. These authentic records have been documented in his colorful, captivating, and rich writing style and are impatiently awaiting closer scrutiny by a wide audience.
 

The tales are of varying length and erotic intensity. The ‘Muses' Comments’ at the end of the stories are both amusing and engaging, while the ‘Author’s Comments’ are quite insightful.

All stories are illustrated by Hardy Laddey, a renowned German artist.

Preview the small art sample contained in the image gallery above. View the
full complement of illustrations and enjoy the free sample chapter on 13sensusualconfessions.info

You’re also warmly invited to visit the Author’s Page on Amazon here.
 

 

It’s not a niché market. It’s the mainstream: The Romantic-Erotica Genré commands over 40% market share of profitable publications.

And ’13 Sensual Confessions’ is poised to occupy a respectable share within that abundant domain!

 

Anonymous interviews with a 100-strong focus group were extremely encouraging. Indeed, most trial readers testified: They adore the book, both the words, and the art!

Reader Testimonials are overwhelming:

  • “The combination of Voss’ texts, Laddey’s pictures, and the Muses’ descriptions has an effect on women comparable to the effect of Viagra on men.” (Julianne Voss-Pamplin, Australia, the author´s 74-year-old mother)

  • “The troika of eyewitness reports, words and images, leaves the connoisseur alternating between feeling a state of speechlessness and being irresistibly breath taken.” (Joshua Kruse, USA, Member of the Focus Group, Homemaker, Teacher of his Homeschooled Kids)

  • “The ’13 Sensual Confessions’ is a real appetizer and an inspiration for making one’s own fantasies evolve into realities.” (Anonymous, Member of the Focus Group)

High praise indeed, which demands a thorough examination by lovers of the romantic-erotic genre.

Do you remember ‘Picture Books’?

Many focus group readers affirmed they share the author's love of illustrated books. Do you remember listening to your Kindergarten teacher reading to you? Do you remember when she turned the book around to show you and your classmates the colorful pictures? Wasn’t it magnetic? Would you now, as an adult, like to relive that magnetism? You can turn back time!

Wrapped between the covers of ’13 Sensual Confessions’ is a fascinating ‘picture book’ for grown-ups.

 

 

Originally, only the hardcover, the 'Collector's Edition', was advance printed and tested. It is a very weighty book due to the exceptional quality of the pages.

Our research clearly showed, while readers loved the book, more flexibility would provide for increased market success. Dividing the ‘Collection’ into two, lighter and less cumbersome 'Volumes' was the first logical amendment to the format.

Strong recommendations from our test readers were to have the book made available electronically. This was not only due to reading convenience, but also, readers felt a stronger sense of privacy was needed when consuming ’13 Sensual Confessions’ on public transport.

The so-called Unit Tree in the below figure demonstrates a product range to satisfy all preferences while paying tribute to all wallet sizes. 



 


Immediate goals include publishing ’13 Sensual Confessions’ as follows:

  • As eBooks - divided into five Selections and the Volumes One and Two on November 1st, 2016;

  • As Paperback Editions - divided into Volume One and Two, in both in full-color and black & white (economy edition) on December 1st, 2016;

  • As the complete 550-page-plus ‘Collector’s Edition’ - in impeccable hardcover quality also on December 1st, 2016

 

Short and Medium-term goals include:

  • Translating the complete series into German and subsequently launching the book on this absolutely key market for the erotic genre.

  • Completing the screenplay of '13 Sensual Confessions'.

  • After establishing consistent cashflow through sales, further translations will include Spanish, French, and Italian;

  • Thereafter, an expansion with translations to Japanese and Chinese is foreseen.

 

Going Forward:

  • A new set of stories for a 'Next Collection' by the Voss-Laddey Duo has been defined. To be commissioned after the successful launch of the first 'Collection';
  • Further publications with other exciting duos are presently in the advanced planning stages; 
  • Also, a  wide range of merchandise is certainly conceivable to benefit from the anticipated success ‘13 Sensual Confessions’.

 

We believe we’re a strong, effective, efficient, and extremely creative group. Our individual track records speak volumes.

The market is competitive. We’re extraordinarily competitive, too, though. We aren’t poled to lose. We love to win!

We’re prepared! We have the products to be well represented in a highly competitive market. aMuse has a mission, and we have a plan.

Could we fail? Yeah, failure is in play ~ as it always is. Is the aMuse Team infallible? What/who is? However, each of us has faced and beaten adversity: We are stronger for it. 

Your benevolent contribution will expedite a successful, global launch of this noteworthy product range potentially facilitating joy and enticing, memorable hours for lovers of the romantic-erotic genre. With your support, we’ll implement. All we need to win is you!



The real challenge for self-publishers today is getting noticed in a true avalanche of eBooks and the creators need funding to energize efforts in this arena. With their own resources dried, the creators need a new seed to finance a breakthrough.
 

To secure global exposure and expand the products into new languages, USD 100,000 is being sought for:

  • Financing the inventory of the first English print editions in both paperback and hardcover: 20,000 USD;

  • Strategic, international marketing of the eBooks and printed books on Amazon and various other popular eBook outlets and platforms in key markets: 30,000 USD;

  • Financing the German translation: 30,000 USD;

  • Launch & Marketing in Germany 10.000 USD;

  • Various administrative costs (ISBN, legal, copyright, travel, office supplies, etc.): 10,000 USD.

 

For further information: info@amuse-me.org.

 

This is ‘What You Get’ for supporting the launch of ‘13 Sensual Confessions':

 

 

 Link: www.13sensualconfessions.info

 

 

 

 


 

                                                           www.13sensualconfessions.info

 

 

 

 

 

Understandably, this perk is currently not on offer via IndieGoGo. To take advantage if this unique opportunity, please contact aMuse directly at:  info@amuse-me.org

 

 

Understandably, this perk is currently not on offer via IndieGoGo. To take advantage if this unique opportunity, please contact aMuse directly at: info@amuse-me.org

 

My Pride, My Fall

 

 

My Collection, My Salvation

 

 


Our Swiss-based team is diverse and international stemming from Australia, Germany, Finland, Ukraine, and France. A number of us have enjoyed the experience of overseas postings most extensively in the USA. We share common goals and are connected by ties of deep friendship.

Breaking the Code of Silence on Families & Courts

Family court issues are deeply emotional. Everyday millions of families are forced into a complicated legal system and forced to deal with deeply personal issues related to their sexual, financial, emotional and psychological issues. A world of "he said- she said" accusations clog family court files and courtrooms where lawyers, judges, CPAs, custody experts and court staff are witness to horrifying stories and private drama. Many stories of real abuse and harm are being  protected by a Code of Silence that fosters injustice.

Ex Parte is going to break the Code of Silence by  publish heart-wrenching stories, conducting shocking interviews and obtaining information from real family court files. Common-sense based editorials, reform advocate battles and academic input will provide coverage of America's Family Court System in a bold and  compelling way -- both in  print and with cutting-edge digital media.

Your support will help us pay for:

  • Print Design & Distribution
  • Investigative Reporters
  • Copiers and Scanners for Court Files
  • Writers
  • Editors
  • Graphic Artists
  • Photographers & Videographers
  • Media Requests and Coverage
  • Public Records Requests
  • Court Watchers and Citizen Journalists
  • Researchers and Academics
  • Social Media Outreach
  • Building a Sophisticated Digital Platform
  • Resource Center for Court Victims

The floodgates opened when the code of silence in the Catholic Church was finally shattered. It's time to expose what families and children face in today's modern divorce, custody and probate courts. 

Help us by providing your stories, information, financial and tactical support. Your help in bringing these issues to mainstream media, lawmakers and members of the public who will be shocked and outraged over what has become the modern legal system responsible for fairly dividing community property and protecting  children.

 

Who Should Get Ex Parte

  • Individuals: Subscriptions to print copies of Ex Parte can be  mailed directly to your home, or to a family member or friend struggling with their own court experience.
  • Employers: Sign up to distribute Ex Parte to help workers and their families understand today's family courts. Productivity increases when employees know they have support and understanding from their colleagues.
  • Schools and Educators: Subscribe, distribute, and use our materials to train and teach. We allow free republishing of all our materials.  Subscriptions heavily discounted for schools, educators and non- profit organizations.
  • Legislators: Issues covered in Ex Parte are impacting the lives of the families and children you serve.  Every grandparent,  mom, dad, sibling, child, aunt, uncle, or cousin knows someone who facing issues in our family courts. Championing reform is a winning platform and we're going to show you what changes will drive support from voters and law makers.

 

Who Said The Courts Are Off Limits?

We don't believe the judicial branch should be given a free pass. Judges, lawyers, clerks, bailiffs, experts, and others in the system need to know their actions are being watched. Good actors should be rewarded and bad actors should be exposed. Sometimes people need to be reminded that their actions impact others and that the law is there for a reason.

You can help bring family court issues to the attention of the mainstream.  Subscribe to Ex Parte for yourself or others, sponsor a distribution, or send a good judge, lawyer or support person and  EX PARTE GRANTED gift. If you have witnessed injustice, send an  EX PARTE DENIED package to remind bad actors they are being watched. Other ways to be involved include a family friendly Lunch Launch Party or  an opportunity to join our  Writers & Editors Roundtable. Every package increases our resources, distribution, and impact.

 

Ex Parte GRANTED Pack includes: a mug, black pen, newspaper, and the following letter:

The Ex Parte motion for [name of judge, lawyer, clerk, etc.] is GRANTED.

After witnessing your  efforts and role in upholding public  trust in our legal system, you have been recommended  to Ex Parte. Your  ethical conduct and contributions  to uphold the law and maintain public trust in our legal system have been exemplary.  You have consistently acted in the best interest of our children. You  are hereby noticed that you have been recommended for nomination  to Ex Parte for your positive efforts and  contributions that help families and children in our modern family court system. 

Thank you for upholding the integrity of the judiciary. It has not gone unnoticed.

Signed,  ( Can remain anonymous)

 

Ex Parte DENIED Pack includes: a calculator, red pen, shot glass, newspaper. This package is  labeled in bright red and includes the following letter:

The Ex Parte motion for [name of judge, lawyer, clerk, etc.] is DENIED.

After witnessing your involvement and role that imposes injustice and violates public trust in our legal system, you have been reported to Ex Parte. Your conduct has served to harm innocent families and children and you are  hereby placed on notice that you are being watched. You are reminded of your ethical duty as a human being to uphold the law and maintain public trust in our legal system.  We find your conduct consistently fails to protect families and children and you have been formally  placed on the Ex Parte Court Watch List.

Signed, ( Can be Signed Anonymously)

story:
How my 30-Day Challenge became a book...

Last fall, after 3 years in New York City, I decided to leave and pursue a quieter life elsewhere. To make the most of my last month in the city, I created a 30-Day Challenge for myself. I decided to do one thing everyday to celebrate my remaining time in the Big Apple.

Friends, family and even strangers followed me on social media, sending me suggestions, commenting on my posts, and cheering me on.

Less than a week in, my simple idea quickly blossomed into a carefully curated tour through the streets of New York City. There were ups and downs, successes and failures, and all sorts of surprises along the way.

In this book, I share what I saw, what I experienced, and what I learned.

Purpose and Perks

Purpose of Campaign
To avoid the wait time of going through the formal publishing process, I have decided to self-publish my book. The funds raised will cover the cost of printing 40 advanced reader copies and 300 first edition paperback copies.

At least 20 advanced reader copies will be distributed to individuals, who will give me feedback and suggestions.

The first edition copies will be distributed a number of ways. In addition to the signed copies that I send to you, the backers, the book will be available for sale directly through me and at independent bookstores. I also plan to ship copies to the organizations and businesses featured in the book. 

Perks for my generous backers
By adding your precious dollars to the kitty, you are saying, "Yes, Janet, I'd read that book! And I'd tell my friends about it too! Get it done!"

In exchange for your vote of confidence, I'm offering a number of thank you gifts to fit a variety of budgets. (The more confident you are, the more you get!!)

The Timeline...(When do I get my copy!?!?!)...

I am aiming to have the advanced reader edition printed by March 1. This will allow for a 6-week revision period. I'll collect feedback, make adjustments and corrections, and have the final manuscript reviewed by a copy editor.

My goal is have the first editions in hand by the end of May 2018. This will be an optimum release date because with the warmer weather arriving (hopefully) it will be an ideal time to visit and explore the streets of New York. 

It will also give me time to get it submitted to the Nantucket Book Festival, and have it on the shelves of bookshops and businesses in time for the tourist season.


Where the money goes...

  • $150 - Photography and artwork for the cover
  • $150 - Copy editing.
  • $600 Advanced Reader Edition - 40 copies at $15/copy
  • $3900 - First Edition of the book in paperback - 300 copies at $13/copy. 
  • $125 - USB # (barcode for back of the book)
  • $200 - Shipping/Admin./Misc.

Getting across the finish line...

This is my first venture into writing a book (gulp!) self-publishing (oh boy!) and selling a finished product I created from scratch (gasp!) I have no doubt getting The 30-Day Challenge: New York from word doc to book form will present as many twists and turns as the challenge itself. There are likely unknown factors that will come up along the way.

In order to set myself up for success, I will do the following:

  • Honor the commitment I have made to you, my backers, by maintaining my timeline as much as humanly possible, so you get your perks in a timely fashion.
  • Consult with other writers, specifically those who have self-published.
  • Be realistic about how much time I have available to work on the book
  • Thoroughly research costs and pricing to keep start-up costs at a minimum.

FREE ways to back me?

If you are tight on cash, but still want to give me your vote of "YES" for the book. Here are a few ways you can help, that cost nothing, and are extremely valuable...

  • Share this link on your facebook page and social media.
  • Tell your friends about my soon-to-be-released book.
  • Agree to read the Advanced Reader Edition and give feedback.
  • Volunteer your time to help me package and ship books.

I am so grateful for any and every contribution. Thank you for your support in sharing my story with the world!
story_txt:
How my 30-Day Challenge became a book...
Last fall, after 3 years in New York City, I decided to leave and pursue a quieter life elsewhere. To make the most of my last month in the city, I created a 30-Day Challenge for myself. I decided to do one thing everyday to celebrate my remaining time in the Big Apple.
Friends, family and even strangers followed me on social media, sending me suggestions, commenting on my posts, and cheering me on.
Less than a week in, my simple idea quickly blossomed into a carefully curated tour through the streets of New York City. There were ups and downs, successes and failures, and all sorts of surprises along the way.
In this book, I share what I saw, what I experienced, and what I learned.

Purpose and Perks
Purpose of CampaignTo avoid the wait time of going through the formal publishing process, I have decided to self-publish my book. The funds raised will cover the cost of printing 40 advanced reader copies and 300 first edition paperback copies.
At least 20 advanced reader copies will be distributed to individuals, who will give me feedback and suggestions.
The first edition copies will be distributed a number of ways. In addition to the signed copies that I send to you, the backers, the book will be available for sale directly through me and at independent bookstores. I also plan to ship copies to the organizations and businesses featured in the book. 
Perks for my generous backersBy adding your precious dollars to the kitty, you are saying, "Yes, Janet, I'd read that book! And I'd tell my friends about it too! Get it done!"
In exchange for your vote of confidence, I'm offering a number of thank you gifts to fit a variety of budgets. (The more confident you are, the more you get!!)
The Timeline...(When do I get my copy!?!?!)...
I am aiming to have the advanced reader edition printed by March 1. This will allow for a 6-week revision period. I'll collect feedback, make adjustments and corrections, and have the final manuscript reviewed by a copy editor.
My goal is have the first editions in hand by the end of May 2018. This will be an optimum release date because with the warmer weather arriving (hopefully) it will be an ideal time to visit and explore the streets of New York. 
It will also give me time to get it submitted to the Nantucket Book Festival, and have it on the shelves of bookshops and businesses in time for the tourist season.

Where the money goes...

$150 - Photography and artwork for the cover
$150 - Copy editing.
$600 Advanced Reader Edition - 40 copies at $15/copy
$3900 - First Edition of the book in paperback - 300 copies at $13/copy. 
$125 - USB # (barcode for back of the book)
$200 - Shipping/Admin./Misc.


Getting across the finish line...
This is my first venture into writing a book (gulp!) self-publishing (oh boy!) and selling a finished product I created from scratch (gasp!) I have no doubt getting The 30-Day Challenge: New York from word doc to book form will present as many twists and turns as the challenge itself. There are likely unknown factors that will come up along the way.
In order to set myself up for success, I will do the following:

Honor the commitment I have made to you, my backers, by maintaining my timeline as much as humanly possible, so you get your perks in a timely fashion.
Consult with other writers, specifically those who have self-published.
Be realistic about how much time I have available to work on the book
Thoroughly research costs and pricing to keep start-up costs at a minimum.


FREE ways to back me?
If you are tight on cash, but still want to give me your vote of "YES" for the book. Here are a few ways you can help, that cost nothing, and are extremely valuable...

Share this link on your facebook page and social media.
Tell your friends about my soon-to-be-released book.
Agree to read the Advanced Reader Edition and give feedback.
Volunteer your time to help me package and ship books.

I am so grateful for any and every contribution. Thank you for your support in sharing my story with the world!

story:
Masterminds Incorporated is intended as a series of horror-detective books for middle-graders, 7-12 years old; think Franklin W. Dixon's Hardy Boys meets R.L. Stine's Goosebumps. Each book in the series will average around 200-pages, allowing for plenty of substance while still being a comfortable read for younger audiences. An Appointment with Fear is the first of, what I hope, is a long line of adventures for the kids of Masterminds, Inc. and young readers alike.

"Something's attacking the townspeople of Wolverton under the cover of night. Officials are at a loss as to the cause but the kids of Masterminds, Inc. think a special breed of vampire is behind it all. The question is; who's the vampire? As the list of victims (and suspects) grows, the light of the full moon reveals that vampires may not be their only concern.

Aided by the help of a library on monster-kind, hidden by a descendant of the famed monster hunter, Dr. Abraham Van Helsing, the kids of Masterminds, Inc. must solve this puzzle or risk falling prey themselves."  In the spirit of complete transparency, I have listed all the costs associated with getting Masterminds Incorporated: An Appointment With Fear into the hands of readers everywhere. I've broken everything down so you can see exactly where each dollar is going and in what order the funds will be allocated.

Even the most prestigious authors must submit their books to the editor before being published. I have already secured a US-based editor with excellent references and editing will begin May 14, 2018 (sooner if her workload allows).

Aside from just the cover illustration that you've seen here, this price also includes an alternate art cover, for FRIGHTENED backers and higher, as well as a promo spread to be used to promote the sale of this book after the campaign has ended.

Without an ISBN this book would be virtually invisible to booksellers and libraries. In addition, most bookstores require a special barcode called the Bookland EAN Barcode. The Bookland EAN Barcode allows for the encoding of ISBN numbers.

This price is for a New Jersey-based, G7 Master Qualified printing company to print 1,000 paperback copies. This quantity is a good middle-of-the-road number as it keeps the printing costs low without swamping me with more paperbacks than I could sell in a realistic time period. This quantity also ensures that the series can continue based on the revenue generated from book sales after the campaign has ended. Making the series self-sustaining so it doesn't require further crowdfunding to publish future books.

1000 copies are going to be heavy and will most likely be shipped via semi-truck. The shipping costs are to get the books from the printing company in New Jersey to my location.

Yes, you read that right, layout and graphic design will be zero dollars! I will be doing all the graphic design and layout myself. Since actions speak louder than words, below is a mock-up of the first couple of pages (also pictured above, not final text) so you can see that the results will be professional and aesthetically pleasing, with a font that's comfortable to read and a layout that's easy on the eyes (literally and figuratively).

All this wouldn't be possible without help from Indiegogo so any/all funds raised will be subject to an 8% cut to cover the cost of using Indiegogo's platform (5%) and the credit card processing fees (3%). Additionally, there's a $0.30 charge for each credit card processed. That is why that total of everything listed above is only $5,650 but the campaign goal is $6,200. The difference is to account for those fees.

All backers, regardless of what Perks you choose will, of course, have my undying appreciation and admiration, but I think something tangible would be more appropriate. So, all backers will receive a personal shout-out on the Masterminds, Inc. Facebook page as well as a personalized 'Thank You' e-mail from yours truly.

FRIGHTENED level backers and higher can choose to receive their book(s) with the exclusive alternate art cover that will ONLY be available for this campaign! Once ended, this exclusive design will be retired and NEVER printed again. The alternate cover art will be posted in the "Comments" section once it's ready. Backers can choose the standard cover if that's their preference.

I have tried to design the Perks for this campaign to be meaningful and of value to you while also being careful to make sure that they're all things I can follow through on without delay. The last thing I want to do is take away from the project or delay it by trying to offer flashy or over-hyped Perks that look great on the sidebar but cause problems when I try to fulfill them.

Does this project have risks? Yes, absolutely, but I've been able to minimize them by getting most of the riskiest parts of the project out of the way before crowdfunding. For one, the book is already finished and in the hands of the editor who, regardless of the state of this campaign, will begin editing May 14, 2018. The same is true for the illustrations, the standard cover is already complete and the alternate cover and promo illustrations are in the works now.

With illustration and editing well in hand, I feel that should we fall short of the funding goal, it will only mean printing fewer books. All monies taken in will go towards editing, illustration, ISBN, and printing, in that order.

Overall, I feel the risks are very low and, with your support, both financially and by spreading the word, I am confident that Masterminds, Inc. will be a success; bringing thrills, chills, mystery, and adventure to readers everywhere!

You can help by sharing this project with anyone and everyone you know that might be interested in this type of literature. Share it on Facebook, Instagram, your vlog, your blog, Pinterest, your friends' podcast, anywhere and everywhere you can. Tell your friends and family and ask them to share it. Post information in your local school or library (with their permission of course). Every person you can share this with is a HUGE help.

Should you have any questions or comments, please, please don't hesitate to ask, I'm happy to answer any questions you might have and I look forward to hearing from you. More importantly, I look forward to sharing Masterminds Incorporated with you. Thank you for your time and your support.

Yours sincerely, Chad Lee Erway

story:
Hey Everyone

A pleasant day to you and yours. I'm writing this to let you know that I can use all the help I can get! I have books scheduled from Paula Ashe and Maxwell Bauman, and getting any money at all would be a big help.

 

That paper money

The goal is 1,500. Anything you can contribute will help immensely, and for the record any money at all will help a ton! Money will go towards...

TELESIGNATURES FROM A FUTURE CORPSE by Paula D. Ashe
HOUSE OF BLOOD AND TEETH by Maxwell Bauman
AS YET UNTITLED STORY COLLECTION by Paula D. Ashe
ASTRUM by Sean M. Thompson
AND MORE SURPRISES TO COME!

blurbs

"Beautiful language describing the most horrific actions, thoughts, and scenarios. She's every bit as hopeless as Ligotti but her work is more visceral. She envisions a world that is apocalyptic on the personal scale, and I beg publishers to make her work more well-known."
--Christopher Ropes author of Complicity

These books will be released in 2021, but right now, we do have...

We have already released a collection SCREAMING CREATURES.

story:
La Storia

Ero uno studente di 26 anni, e la mia vita è cambiata nel momento in cui ho ricevuto la notizia che mio fratello si sarebbe unito ad un ordine di monaci sconosciuto, in un luogo sperduto nel Sud dell’India. All'improvviso si è innescato un processo senza precedenti con un turbinio di domande, che mi ha portato a riconoscere la presenza di una forma di sofferenza nascosta dentro di me: può sembrare un paradosso, ma è stata la cosa migliore che mi sia accaduta nella vita.

Spinto in una nuova dimensione di scoperta interiore, sono diventato un marinaio del dolore, l'architetto invisibile del mio pellegrinaggio da Santiago (Cile), a Los Angeles (CA), a Singapore, per finire a Valeggio sul Mincio (VR). Durante 14 anni ho viaggiato in India e in Messico, pieno di domande, cercando risposte. Ero ossessionato dal tema del Risveglio.

 

-------------

 

 

All'età di 38 anni la vita ha martellato piano piano nel mio cervello e inciso nel mio cuore, con la benedizione della paternità, le risposte che avevo cercato e parzialmente scoperto negli anni precedenti. Tutte quelle aspettative e quella ricerca senza fine sono svanite come foglie secche, spegnendo ogni domanda e conflitto interiore: ero in pace con me stesso... questa è la storia che racconta questo mio primo Libro: Il Viaggio di un Padre alla Scoperta Di Se Stesso.

Per “ascoltare e vedere” profondamente il bambino a cui "dovremmo insegnare", dobbiamo prima ascoltare e guardare noi stessi. A quel punto, loro, senza pretese, iniziano ad insegnarci e guidarci, aiutandoci a scoprire chi siamo veramente.

“Ti vedo figlio mio, perché prima ho guardato me stesso”...

-------------

 

 

La Visione  

Il mio sogno, per questo libro, è quello di aiutare tanti altri genitori come me a trovare quella verità interiore che consente di dissolvere la sofferenza personale, quel sottile conflitto interiore, che ci portiamo avanti come un fardello invisibile, di generazione in generazione, avvicinandoci, con delicatezza e umiltà, al modo di sperimentare del bambino. 

Il mondo ha bisogno di un cambiamento URGENTE e vedo questa emergenza sanitaria solo come un promemoria disperato della natura che ci chiede uno STOP. Fare una pausa e rallentare un attimo la nostra corsa sfrenata. 

Possiamo solo creare un mondo, allo stesso modo in cui ci relazioniamo con noi stessi. Quando il mondo crolla fuori, c’è un bambino che piange dentro.

 

-------------

 

 

Chi sono

Il mio nome è Daniel Bravo, sono un padre di 48 anni. Ho studiato Economia e sono nato a Santiago (Cile), attualmente vivo a Valeggio sul Mincio in provincia di Verona. Ho un figlio di 10 anni che mi ha ispirato e infuso il coraggio di scrivere questo libro. E’ un modo di onorarlo e ringraziarlo per tutto quello che ho imparato grazie a lui. 

Anche se da 10 anni lavoro come consulente nel campo dell’energia,  condividere le mie esperienze con “la Verità” come ricercatore spirituale e padre è la mia vocazione. 

 

-------------

 

Sul Libro

Il libro consta di 200 pagine circa e si sviluppa in 7 parti con circa 60 capitoli. In modo colloquiale, narra diversi momenti della mia vita, intrecciando episodi dell'infanzia, ai primi anni quando ho cominciato la mia ricerca interiore assiemi ai monaci a momenti della mia paternità, tessendo una storia che parla di risveglio della percezione, di come sanare le nostre ferite emotive, di genitorialità autentica e “dell’arte del disimparare", come forze motrici dell'avventura della vita interiore di un padre.

Il libro ci mostra una mappa, con un percorso per genitori interessati all’Auto-consapevolezza.  È un invito a ridefinire il modo in cui ci poniamo di fronte alla Vita. Ma per farlo, dobbiamo riformulare il modo in cui vediamo noi stessi.  Quando ci immaginiamo come individui indipendenti, separati dal resto, il mondo sembra e si sente come una realtà separata, facendo così precipitare la nostra esistenza in una storia di desideri poco utili e paure infinite. Una tale esperienza influenza profondamente la nostra genitorialità e la risposta che otteniamo dalla vita attraverso i nostri figli.

 

Tempo e risorsa investiti

Finora ho investito 12 mesi di lavoro intenso, con oltre 800 ore di ricerca, scrittura, traduzione e implementazione del sito, blog, social media, piattaforma webinar, ecc. 

Ho investito anche circa 600 euro in costi vari di traduzione e hosting, e sono solo all’inizio. 

 

Come mi puoi aiutare e cosa ti offro a cambio

Per pubblicare questo libro in modo indipendente, ho individuato un obiettivo iniziale di 3.800 euro per la versione in italiano, per coprire i costi di stampa e marketing di circa 500 copie. Tuttavia, il mio obiettivo finale è raccoglierne 5.000 euro, per non essere troppo stretti con il budget. 

Questo importo mi consentirebbe di pubblicare come minimo 500 copie e di semplificare molti lavori di editing, formattazione, traduzione, stampa e marketing, realizzazione del sito, nonché di realizzare una versione per ebook, tutte cose che sto facendo da solo, contento, ma con un po’ di fatica. In dettaglio mi aiuterai a coprire i seguenti costi:

  • Revisione
  • Editing
  • Designs (copertina, sito, ecc)  
  • Layout dell'interno del libro (copia fisica e ebook)
  • Branding libro, sito e social media
  • Creazione di un paio di video promozionali
  • Piattaforme per i Podcast
  • Lancio e costi di marketing per 3/4 mesi
  • Stampa
  • Piattaforma Webinar
  • Software per il sito, funnel e social media 
  • Fee del 5% di questa piattaforma 

 

Tutto il denaro raccolto andrà alla produzione del libro, indipendentemente dal raggiungimento dell'obiettivo. Anche se il mio primo obiettivo non viene raggiunto, il mio impegno è di pubblicare almeno 100 libri, consegnandoli entro metà Ottobre 2020. 

Se supero il mio obiettivo finale di 5.000 euro, oltre a significare che siete tutti più fantastici di quanto mi aspettassi, intendo donare il 15% di quanto raccolto in eccesso al mio obiettivo iniziale, per aiutare a sostenere il lavoro di MayanFamilies.org, una non profit che implementa programmi di aiuto e sostegno alle comunità più povere nella regione del Lago Atitlan in Guatemala. E’ una organizzazione a cui tengo molto e che appoggio da qualche tempo. Il resto dei fondi continuerà ad essere dedicato alla stampa, alla distribuzione e al marketing del libro, in modo da arrivare al maggior numero possibile di persone. 


Se contribuisci a questa campagna, potrai scegliere di rivendicare in cambio:

  • una versione ebook del libro o
  • una versione stampata (o varie),
  • il tuo nome nei riconoscimenti,
  • una o varie sedute di approfondimento sul percorso di risveglio che descrivo nel libro, ecc.

Vedi il dettaglio di ogni “perk o pacchetto” in alto a destra, con il suo rispettivo valore.

 

Ecco le prime recensioni 

 

"Il libro è la storia del lungo viaggio alla scoperta di sé dell'autore che gli permette di avere questo sguardo rinnovato sull'essere padre... Ti vedo, figlio, perché prima ho visto me stesso".

Claudia C. Garese, mamma e imprenditrice.

 

"Un viaggio indietro nel tempo verso quei momenti felici in cui portavo nel mio corpo la stella viaggiante il cui nome è Camila che ora ha 22 anni. Leggere questo meraviglioso libro mi ha fatto sentire profondamente l'importanza di essere veri con noi stessi e quindi con i nostri figli, così facendo daremo al nostro pianeta una generazione più consapevole.

Questo libro non è solo per coloro che stanno vivendo la paternità o stanno pianificando di farlo, è una lettura per chiunque abbia un impulso di conoscere e amare se stesso, oltre il razionale, senza restrizioni, e quindi accettare e amare l'altro allo stesso modo."

Daniela Salas, mamma, traduttrice e cantante, Città del Messico.

 

L'autore mette a nudo la sua anima al lettore come un modo per dimostrare che questo libro e i suoi principi sono nati da una profonda e lunga introspezione e autoindagine. Il libro non è un manuale su come fare i genitori, piuttosto, condivide principi e realizzazioni, da provare e testare, scoprendo le modifiche che uno ritenga opportune. Lui stesso ammette: "Non sono nessuno, ma invece, un padre e forse un amico che si sente responsabile della condivisione di queste intuizioni." In questo modo rinfrescante e poco ortodosso, l'autore ti accompagna in un viaggio per diventare un genitore migliore ... una proposta a cui nessun padre dovrebbe rinunciare”. 

Gonzalo Briceno, padre, programmatore e trader, San Francisco, USA.

 

"Non è facile parlare di sé stessi e Daniel ci introduce nel suo mondo, nel suo autentico cammino, con storie che non solo condividono l'unicità della sua vita, ma raggiungono la profondità dell'esperienza umana che la rende universale.  In Occidente, come uomini, ci è stato insegnato poco su come relazionarsi con gli altri e con noi stessi, (corpo, emozioni e pensieri) ed è a questo punto che Daniel, ci dà luce.  Attraverso il suo personale percorso ci introduce alla filosofia vedica dell'India, e costruisce un ponte con basi scientifiche (neuroscienze, biologia, psicologia) per non parlare solo di genitorialità, ma proporre anche semplici esercizi che ci invitano a contemplare i nostri conflitti e ad abbracciare le nostre storie.  Senza dubbio, una frase che mi rimane incisa di questo libro e che interpreta mio vissuto come padre è: "...meglio avere un padre vero che un padre perfetto..." e la consapevolezza del momento presente, senza inizio né fine."

Jaime Zambrano, padre e psicologo, Santiago del Cile.

 

Ogni libro è un viaggio, e questo in particolare lo è. Da questa esperienza, la genitorialità, l'autore ci porta lungo un percorso vitale che è una scoperta, la rivelazione di un modo di essere. Il viaggio è sempre cambiamento, esperienza del nuovo, e questo libro è un invito a vivere la trasformazione e il risveglio della coscienza di ciascuno. Sottile e vero, onesto e commovente.

Rolando Poblete, padre e Dott. in antropologia, Santiago del Cile

 

Rischi e sfide

 

La prima sfida è quella di diffondere la voce su questa campagna: il tempo e le risorse sono limitati, ma la necessità di un modo più veritiero di crescere i nostri figli è immensa. 

Ad un livello più personale, metterti alla luce del pubblico, senza maschere è senza dubbio una sfida. 

Il libro è stato scritto durante 11 mesi di intensa riflessione e ricerca, ma rappresenta i frutti di una vita. Sono passati 6 anni da quando ho smesso di lavorare con le persone come trainer/coach e tornare nell'arena è emozionante, ho pure una leggera sensazione come di farfalle nella pancia.

 

Altri modi in cui mi puoi aiutare 

Capisco che forse non tutti sono in grado di contribuire, ma se uno ha voglia, si può sicuramente aiutare in tanti modi.

  • Spargendo la voce su questa campagna sui tuoi canali social preferiti.
  • Oppure inviando il link di questa pagina e campagna alle persone della tua vita che potrebbero risuonare con la mia storia e avventura. 

 Grazie per il tuo sostegno. 

Soprattutto, grazie per aver aiutato a realizzare un sogno.

 

Domande e risposte 

Se volessi effettuare una donazione ma sono interessato/a a più di 3 copie del libro?

Sotto il titolo di questa pagina della campagna, cerca l'opzione "Ask a question” (fai una domanda) ed inviami una nota e ti contatterò! 

In caso contrario scrivimi a: daniel@truthfulparent.com

 

Cosa succederà se l'obiettivo di finanziamento non viene raggiunto?

Anche se l'obiettivo di finanziamento non viene raggiunto, il libro sarà pubblicato e distribuito a tutti i sostenitori entro la metà di Ottobre 2020, in un modo o nell'altro. Questo è il mio impegno per tutti coloro che sostengono questa campagna. 

 

Come posso acquistare questo libro al termine di questa campagna?

Una volta terminata la campagna, inviami un'e-mail a daniel@truthfulparent.com in modo che io ti possa comunicare dove viene venduto il libro. In alternativa contattami tramite i miei canali social.

 

Quando riceverò il mio libro?

Il mio obiettivo è quello di essere pronto con le consegne del il libro entro metà di Ottobre. I fondi sono disponibili solo 2 settimane dopo la fine della campagna. Ci vuole tempo per la stampa, ecc. Ti farò sapere se c'è qualche ritardo nella pianificazione delle prime consegne. 

 

Ho un negozio e vorrei avere questo libro. Come posso prendere queste disposizioni?

Fantastico! Il modo migliore per organizzarci è inviarmi una email a daniel@truthfulparent.com Grazie per il tuo supporto!
story_txt:
La Storia
Ero uno studente di 26 anni, e la mia vita è cambiata nel momento in cui ho ricevuto la notizia che mio fratello si sarebbe unito ad un ordine di monaci sconosciuto, in un luogo sperduto nel Sud dell’India. All'improvviso si è innescato un processo senza precedenti con un turbinio di domande, che mi ha portato a riconoscere la presenza di una forma di sofferenza nascosta dentro di me: può sembrare un paradosso, ma è stata la cosa migliore che mi sia accaduta nella vita.
Spinto in una nuova dimensione di scoperta interiore, sono diventato un marinaio del dolore, l'architetto invisibile del mio pellegrinaggio da Santiago (Cile), a Los Angeles (CA), a Singapore, per finire a Valeggio sul Mincio (VR). Durante 14 anni ho viaggiato in India e in Messico, pieno di domande, cercando risposte. Ero ossessionato dal tema del Risveglio.
 
-------------
 

 
All'età di 38 anni la vita ha martellato piano piano nel mio cervello e inciso nel mio cuore, con la benedizione della paternità, le risposte che avevo cercato e parzialmente scoperto negli anni precedenti. Tutte quelle aspettative e quella ricerca senza fine sono svanite come foglie secche, spegnendo ogni domanda e conflitto interiore: ero in pace con me stesso... questa è la storia che racconta questo mio primo Libro: Il Viaggio di un Padre alla Scoperta Di Se Stesso.
Per “ascoltare e vedere” profondamente il bambino a cui "dovremmo insegnare", dobbiamo prima ascoltare e guardare noi stessi. A quel punto, loro, senza pretese, iniziano ad insegnarci e guidarci, aiutandoci a scoprire chi siamo veramente.
“Ti vedo figlio mio, perché prima ho guardato me stesso”...
-------------
 

 
La Visione  
Il mio sogno, per questo libro, è quello di aiutare tanti altri genitori come me a trovare quella verità interiore che consente di dissolvere la sofferenza personale, quel sottile conflitto interiore, che ci portiamo avanti come un fardello invisibile, di generazione in generazione, avvicinandoci, con delicatezza e umiltà, al modo di sperimentare del bambino. 
Il mondo ha bisogno di un cambiamento URGENTE e vedo questa emergenza sanitaria solo come un promemoria disperato della natura che ci chiede uno STOP. Fare una pausa e rallentare un attimo la nostra corsa sfrenata. 
Possiamo solo creare un mondo, allo stesso modo in cui ci relazioniamo con noi stessi. Quando il mondo crolla fuori, c’è un bambino che piange dentro.
 
-------------
 

 
Chi sono
Il mio nome è Daniel Bravo, sono un padre di 48 anni. Ho studiato Economia e sono nato a Santiago (Cile), attualmente vivo a Valeggio sul Mincio in provincia di Verona. Ho un figlio di 10 anni che mi ha ispirato e infuso il coraggio di scrivere questo libro. E’ un modo di onorarlo e ringraziarlo per tutto quello che ho imparato grazie a lui. 
Anche se da 10 anni lavoro come consulente nel campo dell’energia,  condividere le mie esperienze con “la Verità” come ricercatore spirituale e padre è la mia vocazione. 
 
-------------
 

Sul Libro
Il libro consta di 200 pagine circa e si sviluppa in 7 parti con circa 60 capitoli. In modo colloquiale, narra diversi momenti della mia vita, intrecciando episodi dell'infanzia, ai primi anni quando ho cominciato la mia ricerca interiore assiemi ai monaci a momenti della mia paternità, tessendo una storia che parla di risveglio della percezione, di come sanare le nostre ferite emotive, di genitorialità autentica e “dell’arte del disimparare", come forze motrici dell'avventura della vita interiore di un padre.
Il libro ci mostra una mappa, con un percorso per genitori interessati all’Auto-consapevolezza.  È un invito a ridefinire il modo in cui ci poniamo di fronte alla Vita. Ma per farlo, dobbiamo riformulare il modo in cui vediamo noi stessi.  Quando ci immaginiamo come individui indipendenti, separati dal resto, il mondo sembra e si sente come una realtà separata, facendo così precipitare la nostra esistenza in una storia di desideri poco utili e paure infinite. Una tale esperienza influenza profondamente la nostra genitorialità e la risposta che otteniamo dalla vita attraverso i nostri figli.
 
Tempo e risorsa investiti
Finora ho investito 12 mesi di lavoro intenso, con oltre 800 ore di ricerca, scrittura, traduzione e implementazione del sito, blog, social media, piattaforma webinar, ecc. 
Ho investito anche circa 600 euro in costi vari di traduzione e hosting, e sono solo all’inizio. 
 
Come mi puoi aiutare e cosa ti offro a cambio
Per pubblicare questo libro in modo indipendente, ho individuato un obiettivo iniziale di 3.800 euro per la versione in italiano, per coprire i costi di stampa e marketing di circa 500 copie. Tuttavia, il mio obiettivo finale è raccoglierne 5.000 euro, per non essere troppo stretti con il budget. 
Questo importo mi consentirebbe di pubblicare come minimo 500 copie e di semplificare molti lavori di editing, formattazione, traduzione, stampa e marketing, realizzazione del sito, nonché di realizzare una versione per ebook, tutte cose che sto facendo da solo, contento, ma con un po’ di fatica. In dettaglio mi aiuterai a coprire i seguenti costi:

Revisione
Editing
Designs (copertina, sito, ecc)  
Layout dell'interno del libro (copia fisica e ebook)
Branding libro, sito e social media
Creazione di un paio di video promozionali
Piattaforme per i Podcast
Lancio e costi di marketing per 3/4 mesi
Stampa
Piattaforma Webinar
Software per il sito, funnel e social media 
Fee del 5% di questa piattaforma 

 
Tutto il denaro raccolto andrà alla produzione del libro, indipendentemente dal raggiungimento dell'obiettivo. Anche se il mio primo obiettivo non viene raggiunto, il mio impegno è di pubblicare almeno 100 libri, consegnandoli entro metà Ottobre 2020. 
Se supero il mio obiettivo finale di 5.000 euro, oltre a significare che siete tutti più fantastici di quanto mi aspettassi, intendo donare il 15% di quanto raccolto in eccesso al mio obiettivo iniziale, per aiutare a sostenere il lavoro di MayanFamilies.org, una non profit che implementa programmi di aiuto e sostegno alle comunità più povere nella regione del Lago Atitlan in Guatemala. E’ una organizzazione a cui tengo molto e che appoggio da qualche tempo. Il resto dei fondi continuerà ad essere dedicato alla stampa, alla distribuzione e al marketing del libro, in modo da arrivare al maggior numero possibile di persone. 
Se contribuisci a questa campagna, potrai scegliere di rivendicare in cambio:

una versione ebook del libro o
una versione stampata (o varie),
il tuo nome nei riconoscimenti,
una o varie sedute di approfondimento sul percorso di risveglio che descrivo nel libro, ecc.

Vedi il dettaglio di ogni “perk o pacchetto” in alto a destra, con il suo rispettivo valore.
 
Ecco le prime recensioni 
 
"Il libro è la storia del lungo viaggio alla scoperta di sé dell'autore che gli permette di avere questo sguardo rinnovato sull'essere padre... Ti vedo, figlio, perché prima ho visto me stesso".
Claudia C. Garese, mamma e imprenditrice.
 
"Un viaggio indietro nel tempo verso quei momenti felici in cui portavo nel mio corpo la stella viaggiante il cui nome è Camila che ora ha 22 anni. Leggere questo meraviglioso libro mi ha fatto sentire profondamente l'importanza di essere veri con noi stessi e quindi con i nostri figli, così facendo daremo al nostro pianeta una generazione più consapevole.
Questo libro non è solo per coloro che stanno vivendo la paternità o stanno pianificando di farlo, è una lettura per chiunque abbia un impulso di conoscere e amare se stesso, oltre il razionale, senza restrizioni, e quindi accettare e amare l'altro allo stesso modo."
Daniela Salas, mamma, traduttrice e cantante, Città del Messico. L'autore mette a nudo la sua anima al lettore come un modo per dimostrare che questo libro e i suoi principi sono nati da una profonda e lunga introspezione e autoindagine. Il libro non è un manuale su come fare i genitori, piuttosto, condivide principi e realizzazioni, da provare e testare, scoprendo le modifiche che uno ritenga opportune. Lui stesso ammette: "Non sono nessuno, ma invece, un padre e forse un amico che si sente responsabile della condivisione di queste intuizioni." In questo modo rinfrescante e poco ortodosso, l'autore ti accompagna in un viaggio per diventare un genitore migliore ... una proposta a cui nessun padre dovrebbe rinunciare”. 
Gonzalo Briceno, padre, programmatore e trader, San Francisco, USA.
 
"Non è facile parlare di sé stessi e Daniel ci introduce nel suo mondo, nel suo autentico cammino, con storie che non solo condividono l'unicità della sua vita, ma raggiungono la profondità dell'esperienza umana che la rende universale.  In Occidente, come uomini, ci è stato insegnato poco su come relazionarsi con gli altri e con noi stessi, (corpo, emozioni e pensieri) ed è a questo punto che Daniel, ci dà luce.  Attraverso il suo personale percorso ci introduce alla filosofia vedica dell'India, e costruisce un ponte con basi scientifiche (neuroscienze, biologia, psicologia) per non parlare solo di genitorialità, ma proporre anche semplici esercizi che ci invitano a contemplare i nostri conflitti e ad abbracciare le nostre storie.  Senza dubbio, una frase che mi rimane incisa di questo libro e che interpreta mio vissuto come padre è: "...meglio avere un padre vero che un padre perfetto..." e la consapevolezza del momento presente, senza inizio né fine."
Jaime Zambrano, padre e psicologo, Santiago del Cile.
 
Ogni libro è un viaggio, e questo in particolare lo è. Da questa esperienza, la genitorialità, l'autore ci porta lungo un percorso vitale che è una scoperta, la rivelazione di un modo di essere. Il viaggio è sempre cambiamento, esperienza del nuovo, e questo libro è un invito a vivere la trasformazione e il risveglio della coscienza di ciascuno. Sottile e vero, onesto e commovente.
Rolando Poblete, padre e Dott. in antropologia, Santiago del Cile

 
Rischi e sfide La prima sfida è quella di diffondere la voce su questa campagna: il tempo e le risorse sono limitati, ma la necessità di un modo più veritiero di crescere i nostri figli è immensa.

Sono passati 6 anni da quando ho smesso di lavorare con le persone come trainer/coach e tornare nell'arena è emozionante, ho pure una leggera sensazione come di farfalle nella pancia. Altri modi in cui mi puoi aiutare

Spargendo la voce su questa campagna sui tuoi canali social preferiti.
Oppure inviando il link di questa pagina e campagna alle persone della tua vita che potrebbero risuonare con la mia storia e avventura. 

 Grazie per il tuo sostegno. 
Soprattutto, grazie per aver aiutato a realizzare un sogno.

Sotto il titolo di questa pagina della campagna, cerca l'opzione "Ask a question” (fai una domanda) ed inviami una nota e ti contatterò!
