For Hero Supporters ($2500 and above) I will personally lead a 1 day on-site workshop for you and 10 of your closest friends, professional colleagues or clients. You will also receive personalized assessments, leadership resources and in-person coaching along with first print copies of The Asymmetrical Leader.
For Premium Supporters ($1000) I will personally provide leadership coaching for you (or someone you designate) for three months. This includes:


Personal and Professional Goal planning (1 year)

Monthly coaching calls for accountability, feedback and support

360-degree assessment of key relationships

Personalized resources
Full email access (excluding Sundays)
Weekly reminders about current goals and feedback

What is The Asymmetrical Leader about?
It's about the heart of leadership and the value created when we understand our unique calling in life (and
helping others do the same) by refining and leveraging our giftedness. The art of leadership,
of making a real difference locally and of creating a better future in tangible and relevant ways.
This isn't a book about
management or marketing. It's for anyone who cares a lot about influencing and impacting others in powerful and remarkable ways. I think we all have a unique gift to share with the world. And, this book is about unleashing the raw materials inside of us to help those we know and love live an extraordinary life.
Who is an Asymmetrical Leader?
Everyone we lock eyes with. 
THANK YOU for making it
happen, and for spreading the word.

story:
Short Summary

A Rebel's Journey describes my path to the ideas of liberty, which began as a search for traditional values. In an effort to ramp up the fundraising in the final weeks, I've decided that ALL donors will now receive either the e-book or audio-book in addition to the other listed perks. If the selected perk includes one, then you will receive both. If the selected perk includes both, you will get a signed copy of the book, as well!

What We Need & What You Get

I'm Darryl W. Perry, the Owner and Managing Editor of Free Press Publications. Over the past 6 years, I've written and published several books. Now, I'm wanting to do something a little different. Instead of selling a book, I want to give it away. Yes, you heard that correctly: I want to give away my newest book!

Why are you giving away a book?

There are many reasons people write books. Some people write because they enjoy doing it, others write because they want to make money, and others write because they want to spread an idea. I've been writing, and publishing long enough to know that it's difficult to make money as a writer, but I still enjoy it, and I want to spread the ideas of liberty - and hopefully spread knowledge along the way.

If you're giving away the book, why should I donate?

I will only give away* the book if I reach my goal of $2,500. <cue Billy Mays> But wait, there's more! If you donate, not only can you get the e-book and the audio book for free, but you can get perks like bonus audio content (including interviews with Jeffrey Tucker, Lynn Ulbricht, Ben Stone and more) OR a signed copy of the paperback book and more!

The Impact

Your donation will serve to replace the profits that I would have earned through a more traditional publication of the book. The funds raised will allow me to get the book into the hands of more people, and promote the book to a wider audience.

Risks & Challenges

There is absolutely no risk.

If less than 50% of the goal is reached, donors will receive their perks however nothing will be released free of charge for the general public.

If at least 50% of the goal is reached, the e-book will be released free of charge, and both the audiobook and physical book will be available at the lowest possible prices that my distributor allows.

If 100% of the goal is reached, the e-book and audio book will be released free of charge (special bonus audio content with the audio book for select donors), and the physical book will be available at the lowest possible price that my distributor allows.

If 250% of the goal is reached, then every donor will receive the e-book and audiobook (including bonus audio) before it's publicly available; and the first 100 donors (in the US & Canada who provide a mailing address) who contribute $15 or more will receive a physical copy of the book!

If 500% of the goal is reached, then every donor will receive the e-book and audiobook (including bonus audio) before it's publicly available; the bonus audio will be publicly released along with the audiobook; and the first 250 donors (in the US & Canada who provide a mailing address) who contribute $15 or more will receive a physical copy of the book!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help me get the word out and make some noise about the campaign.
  • The more money that is raised, the more perks YOU receive, and the more content I release!
  • And don't forget to share the campaign on social media!

story:
¿QUIÉNES SOMOS Y QUÉ QUEREMOS?


Akari Works es una Asociación Juvenil sin ánimo de lucro de Madrid centrada en todo lo referente al Manga, Anime y Cultura Japonesa.
Empezamos nuestra trayectoria siendo un pequeño taller en un instituto de secundaria y poco a poco estamos creciendo.

Queremos llevar esto al siguiente paso, crecer y abrirnos a mucho más público y por ello queremos asentarnos en un local de la zona centro de Madrid, accesible para todos los que quieran pasar a visitarnos.

En este centro que abramos realizaremos numerosas actividades, talleres, cursos, proyecciones, juegos, etc. 
Todo relacionado con lo que más nos gusta, Japón.

Abriremos nuestra biblioteca de manga y anime al público e iremos haciéndola más grande para que cualquier socio pueda disfrutar de ella.

De momento no contamos con ningún tipo de subvención ni ayuda, así que gracias a tu colaboración podremos hacer que este proyecto empiece a funcionar.

Cuanto más crezcamos, más lejos podremos llegar. Y dependerá de vuestra ayuda el límite que nos pongamos. 

¿Cuánto necesitamos y qué recompensas tendrás?


Necesitaremos la cantidad necesaria para empezar a funcionar como centro durante unos meses hasta que el centro se auto-financie con las ganancias que puedan generar los talleres, cursos y actividades.
También necesitaremos comprar algo de material como sillas, una pizarra o ejemplares para la biblioteca.

Hemos calculado que la cantidad que necesitaremos será de 9500€ .
Os ofrecemos distintas recompensas según la ayuda que nos queráis dar, como chapas de la asociación o personalizadas por ti mismo, camisetas, fanzines e invitaciones a la inauguración entre otras. 


¿Y si no logramos la meta?


Si no logramos la meta, ¡intentaremos encontrar un local que se adapte al presupuesto hasta que podamos trasladarnos a un local más grande y conseguir nuestro objetivo!


Si aún así no logramos que la cantidad sea suficiente para llevarlo acabo, ¡realizaremos un evento con la cantidad recaudada para que al menos podamos pasarlo bien en una de nuestras jornadas! 

¿De qué otras maneras puedo colaborar?


¡Difunde esta campaña de Crowdfunding! Puede que a mucha gente le interese y no haya llegado aún a sus oídos.


Puedes utilizar la opción de "Compartir" de Indiegogo.


También puedes ponerte en contacto con nosotros por la página web, redes sociales y correo electrónico.


- E N G L I S H -



WHO WE ARE AND WHAT WE WANT?


Akari Works is a nonprofit Youth Association in Madrid, focused on everything related to Manga, Anime and Japanese Culture.

We began our trajectory as a small workshop in a secondary school and little by little we are growing.

We want to take this to the next step, get bigger and open to the public. We want to settle in an establishment in the center of Madrid, accessible to anybody who wants to visit us.

In this center we would like to do many activities, workshops, courses, projections, games, etc.

Everything related to what we like the most, Japan.

We will open our library of manga and anime to the public and we will be increasing the collection so any member will be able to enjoy it.

Currently we do not have any subsidy or help, so with your help we can make this project becomes operational.

The more we grow, the further we can go. And depends on your help to put us a limit.


How much we need and what are the rewards you will get?


We'll need the amount requiered to keep the establishment running for a few months until is self-financed with the profits it can generate from the workshops, courses and activities. We also need to buy some inventary like chairs, a blackboard or copies for the library. 

We have calculated that the amount needed is going to be € 9500. 

We offer you different rewards depending on the option you choose to help us, like badges (custom or from the association), shirts, fanzines and invitations to the inauguration among others.


And if we don't make it?


 If we don't reach the goal, we'll try to find a place that suits the budget until we can move to a bigger place so we can achieve our goal! 

If we still doon't get enough to take over, we will make a convention with the amount raised so at least we can have a good time in one of our events!


What are other ways I can help?


Spread this Crowdfunding campaign! Many people may be interested and has not yet heard about it.

You can use the option "Share" of Indiegogo.

You can also contact us via the website, social networking and email.

story:
What is this about?
Gabriel's Story

This storytelling card game is a way to help inspire creativity by using a child's imagination. Many children get writer's block. They spend half of their time just trying to figure out what to write about. I am one of those children. I thought, wouldn't it be easier to have a picture to prompt an idea? And with that, this storytelling game was born. With wonderfully illustrated pictures children will become inspired to create fun and imaginative stories to write about or verbally tell. This is a card game and can be taken anywhere. Children can use it for their story writing or as a fun game to play with family and friends. This game is engaging. Want to get a group of people to suddenly bond and laugh together? Play the game and instantly fun ensues.

Game Info:

 There are 54 cards in a pack with instructions on other uses of the game, including writing prompts. I am also creating a deluxe pack that will contain 100+ cards and a special gift. The single card pack will cost around $10-$15 when produced. The Deluxe pack will between $30-$40. Our goal is to get the price as low as possible for our customers. We are working to put it on Amazon. For right now it will be sold on our website at www.reneeahand.com 



The Book Perks
Helping with the perks is Gabriel's mother, Award-Winning Author Renee Hand. She wishes to support her son's endeavors so is offering her books, radio show, and authors visits as perks. Her son will be traveling with her on author visits and will be demonstrating the game to children around the country. The Adventures of Joe-Joe Nut and Biscuit Bill Adventure Series are mystery books that are science based. Teachers in school districts or homeschools will be able to use these books as a cross curriculum for students in 2nd to 5th grades. They fill a niche. They are mysteries that cover topics such as animal tracks, rocks and minerals, and weathering, erosion, and art. The newest book will incorporate Greek Mythology. 
This is what the books are about:
Book 1 is The Great Pie Catastrophe

In this story each page is surrounded by animal tracks that pertain to each suspect, and at the end of the story there are animal facts and questions pages. It is the case of the missing pie.
Book 2 is Mineral Mischief


In this story each suspect collects a specific rock and mineral. For example: Liam the Llama collects igneous rock like gabbro and diorite, but there is one rock in his collection that has a very unique property. He shares that with you as do they all about their collections.
Book 3 is The Secret of the Missing Arch

In this mystery Joe-Joe Nut and Biscuit Bill get with local famous artists of Acorn Valley to create one of a kind paintings about the weather. They are apart of a fundraiser to raise money for animals who have lost their homes because of the weather. Flooding, drought, what have you. At the auction readers will learn 2 things. One, is what inspired the artists to paint such amazing paintings. Two, meteorologist  Rainstar will explain the science behind the phenomenon. Readers will learn some great information all while solving a mystery. 
Book 4 is The Parade of Heroes
Greek History abounds in this 4th adventure in the Joe-Joe Nut and Biscuit Bill award-winning mystery series. Joe-Joe and Biscuit are visiting Acorn Valley's Greek Festival when mysterious things begin happening. Greek hero balloons for the parade are stolen, as are other Greek related items throughout the town. With the parade being a day away, will Joe-Joe and Biscuit be able to make the connection between the items and solve the case before all events are cancelled? Educational fun is added to the back of the book that will enhance learning as readers dive into the world of a Greek mystery.
This book will satisfy the standards schools are requiring for Greek Mythology. Great to use in the classroom. This is a fun way to cover this field. 

Here is what some people have said about this series so far.
Hand's first entry in the series, The Great Pie Catastrophe, won Creative Child Magazine's Seal of Excellence Award, along with her second entry Mineral Mischief, which won a  Creative Child Magazine's Preferred Choice Award. With so much to recommend this entry is rich in presentation. A glossary of weather terminology, artist bios and activities for kids are included.
"An engaging and delicious mystery/educational series with a fun pair of animal detectives and several well-crafted storylines." --Kirkus Reviews

"The all-animal cast of characters participate in the mystery and deliver educational and environmental 'lessons' that combine seamlessly as Biscuit Bill and Joe-Joe Nut work to unravel the mystery of the missing research and paintings. One of the most unique aspects of the book was the information found at the end of the story. These end-pieces included information about weather and several weather experiments that can be conducted in the classroom. This delightful chapter book mystery is for older elementary children - highly recommended!" 5 Star Review by Eileen Johnson for Readers' Favorite

Authors:
Gabriel Hand is eleven years old who loves to inspire others, helping them make their dreams come true. He is the creator of the Storytelling Card Game and wants to inspire children from around the world to follow their dreams. He wants to start his own business so he can come up with fun ways to boost a child's creativity and imagination. The game worked for him and he knows that it will help others. 

Renee Hand is a multi award-winning author and requested speaker on the topic of using fun fiction to teach science, geography and history. Let her show librarians, educators, and parents how using her books can not only challenge readers and the way they think about problems in real life, but she creates high interest topics that suck the reader into her stories encouraging them into wanting to know more about the settings, science, history, culture and people. Skills like reading comprehension, reasoning, deduction and observation come together in a myriad of ways. 

Rewards and Funds Breakdown

What's in it for you:

Apart from using fun fiction to teach science, depending on your level of membership you get (if you want to):

  • A copy of the card game before anyone else.
  • An online preview of the new book before anybody else in the world sees it.
  • Your name as contributor on the book's website.
  • A link to your website from the book's website.
  • A pdf version of the book, which you can store on your computer and reading device for all eternity.
  • The signed paperback delivered to you anywhere in the world.
  • An author visit to your child's school in the United States.
  • An author visit to your child's school in the United States, also lunch with the child. 
  • A chance for your child to create a character the author will use in the story. A dedication will also be added in the front of the book. Child will also be able to work with the author on the character.
  • Authors who help promote will get a chance to get their book reviewed and be on the authors radio show for further promotion. 

Below is the expenses breakdown:

The making:

  • Artwork and professional design of book covers and card game.
  • Time to write, illustrate, create, and promote both books and card game.
Marketing

  • Press releases
  • Review copies of both books and games
  • Online book tours and promotion of all books and games
  • Traveling to schools for visits

Indiegogo fee: 4%

If we get more - we will participate in book and toy fairs (get a booth) and various other events. Attend writers' conferences and more. Funds will also go for the producing and the creating of new card games.

If we get less - we will be disappointed (no use in denying that) and we will have to look for other ways of funding.

You Make the Difference

By participating:

  • You become the force fueling children's creativity and imagination. 
  • You help children follow their dreams. 
  • You open their minds to science in a new way. 
  • You allow children to discover how fun mysteries can be and to challenge themselves. 

There's nothing better than word of mouth, so:

  • Tell your friends, parents, sisters, brothers, cousins, uncles, aunts, co-workers, neighbors and gym club members.
  • Tell the guy sitting next to you on that subway ride, tell the lady from your knitting club. Tell the guy in the supermarket standing behind you in line to the cash register. 
  • Share it with your Facebook friends.
  • Tweet, tweet, tweet!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools.

Thank you for believing in us.

An author visit to your child's school in the United States.
An author visit to your child's school in the United States, also lunch with the child. 
A chance for your child to create a character the author will use in the story. A dedication will also be added in the front of the book. Child will also be able to work with the author on the character.
Authors who help promote will get a chance to get their book reviewed and be on the authors radio show for further promotion. 


Below is the expenses breakdown:
The making:


Artwork and professional design of book covers and card game.
Time to write, illustrate, create, and promote both books and card game.

Marketing


Press releases
Review copies of both books and games
Online book tours and promotion of all books and games
Traveling to schools for visits

Indiegogo fee: 4%
If we get more - we will participate in book and toy fairs (get a booth) and various other events. Attend writers' conferences and more. Funds will also go for the producing and the creating of new card games.
If we get less - we will be disappointed (no use in denying that) and we will have to look for other ways of funding.

You Make the Difference
By participating:


You become the force fueling children's creativity and imagination. 
You help children follow their dreams. 
You open their minds to science in a new way. 
You allow children to discover how fun mysteries can be and to challenge themselves. 




There's nothing better than word of mouth, so:

Tell your friends, parents, sisters, brothers, cousins, uncles, aunts, co-workers, neighbors and gym club members.
Tell the guy sitting next to you on that subway ride, tell the lady from your knitting club. Tell the guy in the supermarket standing behind you in line to the cash register. 
Share it with your Facebook friends.
Tweet, tweet, tweet!
Use the Indiegogo share tools.

Thank you for believing in us.

story:
Brief Review

I am Diego Polanco from Guatemala City. I´ve seen that unfortunately more than 11 companies close each day! One of the main reasons is because they cannot compete with larger companies. Why is that? Guatemala City is a very competitive market and if a company does not have the tools and the money to do publicity, they cannot adquire new customers, simple. They also have a lot of trouble when comunicating new products, new services and new stores. And with a weak social media strategy, they are practically dying.
So what I am going to do is to give them a tool that has proved to be very effective, to make publicity and give them the chance to create a new customer base, to comunicate every action they do and be competitive.This is a very cheap tool because companies only get charge for every coupon sold, so it means that if they don´t sell a single coupon through the platform, they are not going to be charged. 
If I make it, YOU are going to be saving a lot of companies. Which means less unemployment, less migration.

What we need and what you get

I need to start this $3,000. In a country where the avarage salary per year is $3,200, that´s a lot so I really need your help. 
I´m going to invest and spend them in 4 things
1. Paying the fees and charges to suscribe the company in the government offices.
2. Pay the fix costs of the first month.
3. Pay the salaries of my collaborators of the first month.
4. Creat the website along.
When donating, you´ll be getting: thanks with personal call or email, piñatas, Guatemalan hacky sacks or a free stay in Hotel Santa Ana in Antigua Guatemala. 
If i don´t make it to the $3,000, I´m gonna have to make a loan to get the rest. 

Risks and challenges

The competition of group buying platforms, though it´s not too strong, exists. And that´s a challenge, but I´m gonna be more orientated to small and medium size companies instead of big companies so that´s where I am going to decrease the risk of failure. 

Other ways to help

If you have a Guatemalan friend, neighboor, etc., tell him about this project, I´m sure he´s going to help me, we are very supportive.

story:
[HR] - Hrvatska verzija

Kinezi su svjetski putnici br. 1, a glavni motiv dolaska u neku zemlju im je razgledavanje kulturnih znamenitosti i prirodnih fenomena. Naše pitanje od interesa je kako omogućiti komunikaciju posebnih trenutaka između Hrvata i Kineza, a da jezik ne bude barijera. Zanimljiva činjenica – iako 60 % Hrvata zna engleski jezik, samo 1 % Kineza ga razumije i zna pričati, tako da tog asa spremite nazad u rukav. Naše logično rješenje je naučiti Kineza hrvatski jezik ili Hrvata kineski jezik.

Možda ćete si sada pomisliti „Zašto da se mučim i učim? Kineski jezik je pretežak!“, ali prije toga par činjenica. Jedan Kinez po putovanju prosječno potroši oko 750 eura. Hrvatsku je do 20. listopada 2017. godine posjetilo više od 143 tisuće kineskih turista, koji su ostvarili 213,3 tisuće noćenja, što je 57 % dolazaka i 49 % noćenja više nego prošle godine.  Znači, svake godine sve više kineskih turista posjećuje Hrvatsku i želi ostvariti komunikaciju s domaćinom. 

Ka - ching :)

A što ako vam kažemo da se ne morate mučiti s učenjem kineskog jezika kako biste komunicirali s Kinezima. Da! Postoji brzo, jednostavno i lagano rješenje. Suvremeni priručnik hrvatsko- kineskog jezika gdje ćete pronaći:

  • Hrvatsko- kineski pojmovnik pomoću kojeg Hrvat može fonetski izgovoriti kinesku riječ ili čitav pojam
  • Kinesko-hrvatski pojmovnik obogaćen kaligrafskim pismom (ukoliko imate čudan kineski naglasak, ovaj dio priručnika će  pomoći)
  • Ilustracije s detaljnim opisom položaja jezika i usta prilikom izgovora pojedinog kineskog znaka ili pojma
  • Uobičajene fraze i riječi koje se upotrebljavaju u svakodnevnoj komunikaciji

Kako možete biti dio naše kampanje?

Knjiga je napisana, ali kako bi ugledala svjetlo dana predstoji nam još puno posla. Autorica priručnika Marija Opačak, marljivo je radila proteklih mjeseci na pripremanju sadržaja te razgovarala s brojnim akterima koji bi mogli pomoći u izdavanju knjige. Sada slijedi lektura i korektura hrvatskog i kineskog teksta, dizajn i ilustracije, tisak, distribucija... a tu nastupaš TI, dragi čitatelju! Što više sredstava uspijemo prikupiti, to će knjiga biti kvalitetnija i ljepša. Tvrdi uvez, besprijekorne ilustracije, tisak na recikliranom papiru - samo su neki od detalja na koje ti možeš utjecati. Knjigu planiramo završiti i objaviti do lipnja 2018. godine.


Čitav projekt ovisi o prikupljenim sredstvima, a svoj doprinos možeš dati na vrlo jednostavan način. Kao znak zahvalnosti, pripremili smo ti različite nagrade koje se nalaze s desne strane pored ovog teksta. Pronađi nešto što te zanima te sa samo par klikova, uz sigurnu transakciju putem kreditne/debitne kartice, budi dio kampanje.

Ako želiš kombinirati neke nagrade koje nisu ponuđene, pošalji nam poruku pa ćemo se dogovoriti.

Kako još možeš pomoći?

Nadamo se da ćeš prepoznati vrijednost ove inicijative i pomoći nam da uspješno dođemo do cilja. Ako nisi u mogućnosti financijski podržati izdavanje knjige - nema problema, razumijemo te! Postoji čitav niz drugih načina kako nam možeš pomoći!

Za početak, podijeli informaciju o ovoj kampanji i planiranom terminu objave knjige među svojim prijateljima, članovima obitelji, susjedima, kolegama, suradnicima, tetama u knjižnici ili bilo kim tko bi imao koristi od našeg priručnika.

Hvala•Thanks•谢谢！

 

[EN] - English version

The Chinese are the no.1 word travellers and their main motivation for visiting a country is to explore cultural sights and natural phenomena. Our question of interest is how to facilitate the communication of special moments between Croats and Chinese without language being a barrier. Interesting fact – although 60% of Croats speak English, only 1% of Chinese can understand and read it, so you can put that trick right back up your sleeve. Our logical solution is to teach a Chinese Croatian, or a Croat Chinese.

You may think to yourself “Why should I bother with learning? Chinese is too difficult!”, but before you do, here are a few facts. One Chinese spends about 750 Euro per trip. By 20 October 2017, more than 143 thousand Chinese tourists visited Croatia, and they made 213.3 thousand overnight stays, which is 57% visits and 49% overnight stays more than last year. So, each year more and more Chinese tourists visit Croatia and want to establish communication with the host.

Ka - ching :)

What if we tell you that you don’t have to go through the trouble of learning Chinese to communicate with the Chinese? Yes! There is a fast, simple and easy solution. A contemporary Chinese-Croatian manual where you will find:

  • Croatian-Chinese glossary which the Croatian can use to phonetically pronounce a Chinese word or the whole phrase
  • Chinese-Croatian glossary enriched with calligraphic script (if you have a weird Chinese accent, this part of the manual will be helpful)
  • Illustrations with a detailed description of the tongue and mouth positions for pronouncing a specific Chinese symbol or term
  • Common phrases and words used in everyday communication

How can you be a part of my campaign?

 

The book is written, but there is still a lot of work to do for it to see the light of day. The author of this manual, Marija Opačak, has been working diligently over the past months to prepare the content and talking to a number of stakeholders who could help in publishing the book. Now the Croatian and Chinese texts need to be proofed and corrected, the design and illustrations need to be made, it needs to be printed and distributed… this is where YOU come in, dear reader! The more funds we raise, the better and more beautiful the book will be. Hard cover, impeccable illustrations, printing on recycled paper – these are just some of the details you can have a say in. We plan to complete and publish the book by June 2018.

The entire project depends on the funds collected, and you can contribute in a very simple way. As a sign of gratitude, we have prepared various perks on the right side next to this text. Find something you find interesting and with just a few clicks, with a secure credit/debit card transaction, become part of the campaign.  

If you would like to combine some perks which are not offered here, send us a message and we can arrange it.

How else can you help?

We hope you will recognize the value of this initiative and help us reach our goal successfully. If you are not able to financially support the publishing of this book – no problem, we understand! There are a number of other ways you can help us!

To begin with, share information about this campaign and planned book publishing date with your friends, family members, neighbours, colleagues, associates, library employees or anyone who would benefit from our manual.

Hvala•Thanks•谢谢！

 

 [ZH] - Kineska verzija

中国人世界上人数最多的旅行者，他们游览一个国家的主要目的是探索人文景观和自然景观。我们感兴趣的问题是，如何帮助克罗地亚人和中国人在某些特别情况下没有语言障碍的交流。有趣的事实–虽然60%的克罗地亚人说英语，却只有1%的中国人能够理解和读懂它，所以你可以把这个对于中国人来说用处不大的东西收回去了。我们的目的案是教中国人克罗地亚语，或者教克罗地亚人中文。你可能会想：“我为什么要花费心思去学习它呢？中文太难了！“但当你这样想的时候 ，请了解以下事实。一个中国人每次旅行大约花费750欧元。截至2017年10月20日，已有14万3000多名中国游客到克罗地亚旅游，过夜住宿21万3300多人，中国游客比去年增加57%，过夜人数比去年增加49%。因此，每年有越来越多的中国游客访问克罗地亚，希望与东道国建立联系。

清嘉 :)

如果我们告诉你，你不必经历学习汉语的麻烦，与中国人交流呢？对!有一个快速，简单，容易的解决方案。一个当代中文和克罗地亚语指导手册，你会发现：

•克罗地亚语汉语词汇，可以用克罗地亚语发音来读中文词汇或段落

•词汇丰富的中文克和罗地亚语书法脚本（如果你有一个奇怪的中国口音，手册的这部分将对你有帮助）

•如何用嘴巴和舌头来发一些特殊汉语符号或术语音的详细图解

•日常交流中常用的短语和词汇

你怎样能成为我项目的一部分？

 

虽然写书看起来很简单，但然需要做许多工作去完善它。本手册的作者，欧阳丽华，一直勤奋工作，在过去的两个月准备内容以及和许多可以帮忙出书的相关利益者进行交谈。现在克罗地亚语和中文文本需要校对和修改，设计和插图需要制作，需要印刷和分发……这就是你需要做的事情，亲爱的读者！我们筹集的资金越多，这本书就越好，越漂亮。硬封面，无可挑剔的插图，可循环使用的环保印刷纸 -这些只是一些细节，你可以有发言权去完善它。我们计划在2018年6月前完成并出版这本书。

整个项目的进行程度取决于所收集的资金，你可以非常简单的方式奉献一份力。作为感谢，我们在这篇文章的右边准备了各种各样的福利。你只需点击几下，就能找到一些你感兴趣的东西，或者办理一个安全的信用卡/借记卡，就成了项目的一部分。

如果你想结合一些优惠，这里没有提供，给我们一个信息，我们可以安排它。

你还能做什么？

我们希望您能认识到这一倡议的价值，并帮助我们成功地实现我们的目标。如果你不能在资金上支持出版这本书-没问题，我们明白！还有很多其他的方法可以帮助我们！

首先，与你的朋友、家庭成员、邻居、同事、同事、图书馆职员或任何能从我们手册中获益的人分享关于这个项目的信息，并计划出版图书日期。

Hvala•Thanks•谢谢！

There are a number of other ways you can help us!To begin with, share information about this campaign and planned book publishing date with your friends, family members, neighbours, colleagues, associates, library employees or anyone who would benefit from our manual.Hvala•Thanks•谢谢！  [ZH] - Kineska verzija中国人世界上人数最多的旅行者，他们游览一个国家的主要目的是探索人文景观和自然景观。我们感兴趣的问题是，如何帮助克罗地亚人和中国人在某些特别情况下没有语言障碍的交流。有趣的事实–虽然60%的克罗地亚人说英语，却只有1%的中国人能够理解和读懂它，所以你可以把这个对于中国人来说用处不大的东西收回去了。我们的目的案是教中国人克罗地亚语，或者教克罗地亚人中文。你可能会想：“我为什么要花费心思去学习它呢？中文太难了！“但当你这样想的时候 ，请了解以下事实。一个中国人每次旅行大约花费750欧元。截至2017年10月20日，已有14万3000多名中国游客到克罗地亚旅游，过夜住宿21万3300多人，中国游客比去年增加57%，过夜人数比去年增加49%。因此，每年有越来越多的中国游客访问克罗地亚，希望与东道国建立联系。清嘉 :)如果我们告诉你，你不必经历学习汉语的麻烦，与中国人交流呢？对!有一个快速，简单，容易的解决方案。一个当代中文和克罗地亚语指导手册，你会发现：•克罗地亚语汉语词汇，可以用克罗地亚语发音来读中文词汇或段落•词汇丰富的中文克和罗地亚语书法脚本（如果你有一个奇怪的中国口音，手册的这部分将对你有帮助）•如何用嘴巴和舌头来发一些特殊汉语符号或术语音的详细图解•日常交流中常用的短语和词汇你怎样能成为我项目的一部分？ 虽然写书看起来很简单，但然需要做许多工作去完善它。本手册的作者，欧阳丽华，一直勤奋工作，在过去的两个月准备内容以及和许多可以帮忙出书的相关利益者进行交谈。现在克罗地亚语和中文文本需要校对和修改，设计和插图需要制作，需要印刷和分发……这就是你需要做的事情，亲爱的读者！我们筹集的资金越多，这本书就越好，越漂亮。硬封面，无可挑剔的插图，可循环使用的环保印刷纸 -这些只是一些细节，你可以有发言权去完善它。我们计划在2018年6月前完成并出版这本书。整个项目的进行程度取决于所收集的资金，你可以非常简单的方式奉献一份力。作为感谢，我们在这篇文章的右边准备了各种各样的福利。你只需点击几下，就能找到一些你感兴趣的东西，或者办理一个安全的信用卡/借记卡，就成了项目的一部分。如果你想结合一些优惠，这里没有提供，给我们一个信息，我们可以安排它。你还能做什么？我们希望您能认识到这一倡议的价值，并帮助我们成功地实现我们的目标。如果你不能在资金上支持出版这本书-没问题，我们明白！还有很多其他的方法可以帮助我们！首先，与你的朋友、家庭成员、邻居、同事、同事、图书馆职员或任何能从我们手册中获益的人分享关于这个项目的信息，并计划出版图书日期。Hvala•Thanks•谢谢！

story:
In a state run by corrupt and retarded people... In an economy with monopolies, cartels and corpulent adhesion between business and authorities...

I want in, suckers!

Hello. Make me an oligarch, please.

I am Samuil Petkanov - owner and author of the spoof media site nenovinite.com (media №37 in the country). In Bulgaria it is OK to own a media that brutally neglects the facts and warps reality to absurd proportions, so the first step is made.

The second step is to become rich. I need 1 million leva ($600 000) in order to make the next step. I need the money for nice new socks and to bribe officials who then will grant me public and EU funding. If I'm lucky, I will make connections with a bank that is only nominaly a bank and actually is the next pyramid that operates with government money and finances oligarchic schemes.

I might get lucky on my own, but most probably I'm gonna get screwed. So I think I should obtain public resources directly and democratically. Yes, I might get my first million through shady schemes but it will take more time and it will cost you more, because of the corrupt public sector intermediaries who will get a cut from it.

So give me money directly - it will be faster for me, cheaper for you and also - transparent. You will also get some pointless perks.


Money, money, money.

The money you send me will be money well wasted. Especially if I get bored from the idea and buy myself a Playstation.

Giving money to me directly won't exclude you in any way from giving to other oligarchs - you will still pay taxes, buy their newspapers and other services and goods their companies sell you. So you can't lose anything. Except money and common sense.


Being the first democratically created oligarch

Being a new type of oligarch means that I have yet to prove myself. These are some of my goals:

- I will tell poorer people that having undeservedly huge amount of money is a great amount of stress and responsibilities, so they should shut up and don't complain.

- I will fix football games and even whole tournaments and tell you the scores so you can bet and give me some of the winnings in order to maintain a win-win relationship.

- My wife will be in talk shows every week to tell other women how to spend money on a bullshit lifestyle and chomeopatic dresses made from sunshine and astrological lava.

- I will post on Facebook and Twitter pseudo-wisdom how to be successful in life, the Universe and everything.

- I will buy even newer socks once in a while.

Risks & Challenges

There are no risks when you are undiservingly rich. It's just cool.

Other Ways You Can Help

One day some of you might work for me or you might get lucky and even steal some of my wealth. But until this day comes I need to obtain it.

Share my campaign with naive people who will give me money!

story:
I'm a single, stay at home mom. 
When I say stay at home, what I really mean is stay at my parents home. I know, glamorous, right? I'm lucky, my parents have been generous enough to allow my son and I to live with them, and support us while I've been less than financially stable. The original plan was just to stay for a few months while I was on maternity leave from my job as a call center agent, then back to the daily grind and back on our own. What I realized when it was time to go back, was that a $10.00 per hour wage, is not enough to pay for daycare, food, bills, and an apartment. So why go back to work and send my son to daycare all day, if I can't better our situation? I just didn't see the point. 
Then arose the problem, what AM I going to do? We can't live here forever, my parents are great, but we drive each other a little crazy. With four people living in the house, we're seriously lacking in space and sometimes patience for putting up with one another. Time to find a job then right? Well, that sounds great in theory, but call centers don't give you a lot of experience for high paying jobs. "I'll go back to school! That's the ticket!" - said Kimmy, so I did. 
I took a math class at the local community college, and passed with the best grade in the class, but the same problem arose, finding childcare is hard. I've got no source of income to pay for it. I thought about taking a full class load, and receiving federal funding for living expenses, but then once I do get a better paying job, I'll be paying off student loans for years. To me that seems like I'm going backwards, right now I have no money, and I certainly don't want negative money. 
Back to the drawing board, so I started looking around online, trying to find the best ways to make some cash, and this is what I've come up with. I can work from home and maybe, just maybe, never have to worry about money again. 

Heres the plan. Start a blog about making millions, theres plenty of ideas on google about how to make lots of money, and I'm going to try them all. Once a week, I'll start a new project, post the idea and blog regularly about my progress. The goal is to grow a fan base, raise some donations, and hope that one of these million dollar projects pays off. 
Where you come in, I need start up money to host my website. I've started my 14 day trial on squarespace and I need $96 dollars to launch it. Any remaining money will go to video editing software and other basic needs to start my first few projects. 
So please, donate what you can, and share this page so I can get my blog up and running, and hopefully, make some millions.

story:
Short Summary


Embraced by the Divine – The Emerging Woman’s Gateway to Power, Passion and Purpose shows us that no matter what challenges, misfortunes or trauma life throws at us, there is always the chance to turn it around, to grow from the experience and to triumph against all odds.

I have created this crowdfunding campaign as another way to demonstrate that we can overcome just about anything with the feminine way of cooperation, support and power.

Receive a FREE CHAPTER from the book to enjoy now when you contribute $20 or more, as well as lots of other great Perks!

Perhaps you did not realize that getting a book out there these days is not like it used to be … these days the promotion comes down to the authors. Authors don’t usually make a lot of money out of publishing a book and this one is truly a labor of love. We believe so strongly in the messages of this book that we want it to get out to as many people as possible. And with your funding and support we can do that. We’ve always felt this is a co-creation and an example of the new way forward and we’d love you to be a part of this journey with us.

Each co-author in this book was selected based on divine guidance. None of them were asked to pay a fee up front to be involved.

Join me today to move mountains and bridge continents to make this vision a reality! (You can get the full breakdown of how the funds will be used further down the page.)

Hi, I’m Michelle Mayur, the compiling author of this exceptional anthology BY women FOR women. Embraced by the Divine is filled with raw authenticity, love and spiritual wisdom from some of the most light-filled soul sisters,

In meditation I was told by my angel guides, “We want you to share stories of heartache, pain, hope and personal transformation. Your story is to be about how everyday women have faced challenges, maybe even hitting rock bottom emotionally and financially, and what has created the shift within them from despair and desperation to hope and courage."


“Embraced by the Divine – The Emerging Woman’s Gateway to Power, Passion and Purpose is filled with empowering stories of strength and courage that will inspire you to trust that there’s always hope, even in the most difficult times. This book will guide you in living your greatest life.”
~ Marci Shimoff #1 NY Times Bestselling Author


I wrote my own chapter in Embraced by the Divine about the multiple levels of Fear I had to move through progressively – each one increasingly outside of my comfort zone – in order to think bigger and to take my healing and teaching work onto the world stage. So many times my Faith and Trust were tested to the limit as I was called to surrender the self-doubt and limiting beliefs about not being good enough.  In the process I truly felt myself embraced by the Divine.

My journey through layers of deeper fear still continues as the Divine invites me to continue stepping up, more fully in my power, so I can make a bigger difference in the world than I had ever dreamed possible. My intention is to inspire you to do the same. Embraced by the Divine gives you the practical tools, techniques and processes allow you to live your life passionately on purpose.

Each chapter is a deeply personal, raw and vulnerable account of one or more crisis periods in each woman’s life, her Dark Night of the Soul. The authors show how in partnership with the Divine they found that deep inner courage and strength to not only break through to a higher level and to grow as a person, but also to follow their dreams and achieve success, often phenomenally.


This co-creation is also a testament to the power of women heralding in the new paradigm of the feminine way of working in collaboration, co-operation and love.


Now I am inviting all heart-centered people, such as you, to help Angel Wings Publishers and me publish Embraced by the Divine – The Emerging Woman’s Gateway to Power, Passion and Purpose. Our goal is to make this book available for purchase around the world so its powerful messages of love, inspiration, courage and hope can be accessible to women everywhere.

Please join me and the book collaborators with your pledge today. We have a wonderful list of offerings. Take a look at the right of your screen and find the perk that suits you best.

Please share this campaign with your friends and family! In the spirit of feminine cooperation every effort counts to move this project forward.

Our campaign closes on Thursday, November 12th. Thank you for pledging today.


What I Need & What You Get

$4,500 will help us launch the book in a big way and inspire at least 100,000 women around the world!

Here's the Breakdown:

  • $800 – Graphic artwork for the book cover and website
  • $400 – Professional laying out of both the softcover and Kindle versions
  • $350 – Final editing
  • $500 – Administrative support
  • $900 – Printing of softcover books and shipping for the physical book launch
  • $150 – Banner creation for the physical book launch
  • $1,400 – Online bestselling book launch campaign and marketing for both the softcover and the Kindle versions, through structured marketing advice from my professional publicist

Any funds raised above the $4,500 mark will go into further promotion and marketing of Embraced by the Divine so that the book and its inspirational messages of hope and courage can reach even more people around the world, especially women.

In the event that we don’t reach the $4,500 target, as much money as possible will still be put into promoting the book.

The book collaborators and I have created some FABULOUS PERKS for you, including my own chapter to enjoy now,  when you donate to our fundraising, including private consultations, home study programs and downloadable audios.  This is a golden opportunity to do deep transformational work with me and the collaborators at a fraction of the usual price.


I am encouraged that funds are also coming in other ways too, such as from BEST PRACTICE BUSINESS SCHOOL www.bestpracticebusinesscoaching.com.au which is now our MAJOR SPONSOR.

This business is interested in reaching more of its target market of women and will  be prominently featured in all my press releases, in the book itself and on the website.


The Impact

When I set my mind to do something, I get it done. That is my track record in a whole lot of different areas, including founding the Heal the Healer Community and taking it up to members from over 100 countries in just over a year. Distributing my book Embraced by the Divine in a HUGE and international way is my vision and my commitment.

Your contribution can mean the difference between Embraced by the Divine only reaching a small proportion of the women who are hungry to feed their soul with its life-changing messages versus it being a major inspirational and transformational tool for at least 100,000 women everywhere.

Are you or do you know a woman who is feeling that deep inner soul stirring to break through limiting beliefs and fears to realize your personal power? Do you need more inspiration and confidence to feel your dreams are within reach and fully embrace your life purpose?

When you read this inspiring book, you will learn practical skills, techniques and tools all women should be able to access in order to gain greater confidence, self-empowerment, inner healing, emotional harmony, self-love and self-realization.

This is a must-read for every woman feeling that inner nudging to claim more of her power and passion, while also being inspired to make a bigger difference in the world.


Risks & Challenges

There is virtually no risk to you in donating to this Campaign and lots to gain. The softcover version of Embraced by the Divine is now ready to go to print and the Kindle version is also fully ready.

For me personally, getting Embraced by the Divine to this stage has been one of the steepest learning curves of my life and has necessitated abandoning my old comfort zone completely. I used divine guidance to choose the women who have contributed chapters to this anthology due to the “soul sister” bond I feel with them and also because of their exceptional stories of turning major challenges into wonderful growth.

I have had to quickly develop skills in editing, website creation for the book, social media and in doing all the administrative and organizational aspects.

Having more funding for Embraced by the Divine would allow me to employ someone to take care of a lot of the back-end and basic marketing stuff for me, which is currently so time-consuming. A win-win as yet another co-creator will be brought into the fold, sharing the abundance.

I have come way too far with Embraced by the Divine to let it reside on the back-burner. I am 100% committed to this book reaching women around the world and eventually being translated into different languages.

No matter what challenges lie ahead, with such clear guidance I know Embraced by the Divine will be the success it is meant to be.


Other Ways You Can Help

MAKE SOME NOISE! Even if you can’t contribute financially, you can still help. 

·  Get the word out about the Embraced by the Divine Fundraising Campaign. You can tell your friends, family and co-workers.

·  Post the campaign link on social media. Write about it in your blog or newsletter.

·  Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Stop by the website www.EmbracedByTheDivine.com to opt-in to receive the FREE GIFT from the collaborators:
6 POTENT PROCESSES TO FULLY EMBRACE YOUR POWER.
That way I can also let you know when the book is available to pre-order.

From the bottom of my heart, thank you.

The softcover version of Embraced by the Divine is now ready to go to print and the Kindle version is also fully ready. For me personally, getting Embraced by the Divine to this stage has been
one of the steepest learning curves of my life and has necessitated abandoning
my old comfort zone completely. I used divine guidance to choose the women who have contributed chapters
to this anthology due to the “soul sister” bond I feel with them and also because
of their exceptional stories of turning major challenges into wonderful growth. 
I have had to quickly develop skills in editing, website creation
for the book, social media and in doing all the administrative and
organizational aspects. 
Having more funding for Embraced by
the Divine would allow me to employ someone to take care of a lot of the
back-end and basic marketing stuff for me, which is currently so time-consuming. A win-win as yet another co-creator will be brought into the fold, sharing the abundance.
I have come way too far with Embraced
by the Divine to let it reside on the back-burner. I am 100% committed to this book reaching women around the
world and eventually being translated into different languages.
No matter what challenges lie ahead, with such clear guidance I know Embraced by the Divine
will be the success it is meant to be.
Other Ways You Can Help
MAKE SOME NOISE! Even if you can’t
contribute financially, you can still help. 

· 
Get the word out about the Embraced
by the Divine Fundraising Campaign. You can tell your friends, family and co-workers.
· 
Post the campaign link on social media.
Write about it in your blog or newsletter.
· 
Remember to use the Indiegogo share
tools!Stop by the website www.EmbracedByTheDivine.com to opt-in to receive the FREE GIFT from the collaborators: 6 POTENT PROCESSES TO FULLY EMBRACE YOUR POWER. That way I can also let you know when the book is available to pre-order.
From the bottom of my heart, thank
you.

story:
Mission Statement: Fantastic Stories of the Imagination was revived with the intent of providing readers with great free science fiction and fantasy short stories, while paying writers as much as possible for original stories. We believe that short fiction is the life blood of genre fiction. Fantastic Stories endeavors to be inclusive; writers of all genders, sexual orientations, religions, and races are equally welcome here.

Our goal with this campaign is to help insure our ability to publish high quality science fiction and fantasy, while paying our writers and columnists one of the highest rates available in today’s marketplace. We also want to continue offering our content free (for one month) on the web, providing our writers a showcase for their considerable talents. Readership has grown with each of our first seven monthly issues.

Fantastic Stories of the Imagination is edited by Warren Lapine, who has been nominated for the Hugo, World Fantasy, and Chesley awards. In the last twenty years he has been the publisher or editor of Weird Tales, Realms of Fantasy, Absolute Magnitude, Dreams of Decadence, Fantastic Stories, and a number of other magazines and anthologies.

Even if you can’t donate right now, we appreciate your help in sharing this campaign with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, and other social networking sites.

Perk #1: Pledge $10.00 and get the five e-pubs/mobi from our first year and your name on the list of supporters on our website.

Perk #2: Pledge $15.00 and get all seven of the e-pubs/mobi to date, as well as the annual e-pub anthology, and your name on the list of supporters on our website.

Perk #3: Pledge $25.00 and get everything in the first two perks and a one year subscription to the e-pub version of the magazine, as well as the annual e-pub/mobi anthology, and your name on the list of supporters on our website.

Perk #4: Pledge $45.00 and get everything in the first three perks as well as the hardcover edition of the annual print anthology, signed by Warren Lapine.

Perk #5: Pledge $60.00 and get everything in the first four perks, as well as a signed ARC of the annual print anthology.

Perk #6: Pledge $100.00 and get everything from the first five perks and a Fantastic Stories T-shirt.

Perk #7: Pledge $200.00 and get everything in the first six perks and a life-time subscription to the e-pub/mobi version of the magazine.

Perk #8: Pledge $250.00 get everything in the first seven perks and receive a story critique from Jay O’Connell. (Jay is one of the editors of our e-pub book line and has had fiction appear in Asimov’s, Interzone, F&SF, and elsewhere.) (3 available)

Perk #9: Pledge $300.00 and get everything in the first seven perks and receive a story critique by our editor-in-chief, Warren Lapine. (5 available)

Perk #10: Pledge $400.00 and get everything in the first seven perks and receive a copy of the Shadows and Reflections limited edition Roger Zelazny anthology, edited by Warren Lapine and Trent Zelazny, and signed by all the authors, including Neil Gaiman and Steven Brust. (5 Available)

Perk #11: Pledge $500.00 and get everything in the first seven perks and multiple Hugo Award winning author Allen Steele will name a character after you in an upcoming book. (1 available)

Perk #12: Pledge $500.00 and get everything in the first seven perks and Jay O’Connell will work a photo of you into the illustration for an upcoming story in Fantastic Stories. (3 available)

Perk #13: Pledge $600.00 and get everything in the first seven perks and have dinner with editor Warren Lapine, and authors Allen Steele and Shariann Lewitt. This will take place at Readercon, July 11th, 2015. (And we’ll pay for the meal). (3 available)

Perk #14: Pledge $700.00 and get everything in the first seven perks and get personal responses from Warren Lapine on your next six submissions. (5 available)

Perk # 15: Pledge $750.00 and get everything in the first seven perks and have the next annual e-pub anthology dedicated to a person of your choice. (1 available)

Perk #16: Pledge $1,000.00 and get everything in the first seven perks and have the annual print anthology dedicated to you. (1 available)

story:
*update: we are sorry to see this campaign failing as the people do not engage nor reach out. We know all of you are with us on this journey as the campaign has reached over 2500 views in just the first few days. However no one contributes and unfortunately we do not have the circle of believers at hand to get this campaign going with the first 20-30% that it needs so others can follow. Thank you to those that have reached out already, but without the most of you, our hands are tight. Thank you.

The miracle book

My name is Poppy and I am the author of "Spiritual Awakening". I take direct narration from the angels through mental hearing (clairaudience). They guided me here now; they guided you here as well. Contribute to bring change to the world, share this campaign to assist the angels with their work of helping us all rise.


"This book is a stairwell to heaven. Anything one needs to know and steps to take to uplift in spirit. This is our answer to humanity's plea for help. We listened, we respond." - -The angels.

Spiritual awakening: An Angels' guide to the expansion of self ensures spiritual growth that brings those who read it to their own spiritual enlightenment. The angels' words are loving, soothing and inspirational, resembling their nature. This book fills the reader with high energy, opens the portal of connection with the divine as well as with one's own higher consciousness. It answers critical questions such as who we are and what is our life's purpose, it explains the science behind the law of attraction and offers insightful explanations to magical exercises and rituals towards the expansion of self. 
THIS IS NOT A RELIGIOUS BOOK; IT IS SPIRITUAL.

In a few words, it is a guide from beyond towards bliss and completion of being. You can boldly describe it as the new Bible; it is here to change your life.


    What We Need & What You Get

    • The book is complete and ready for the next step. All the funds will go for the design, publication, audio book and marketing of the book to reach all of you.
    • The perks are one of a kind and provide you with direct contact with the author and the angels. This book and the perks we provide for the campaign, are here to help you on your spiritual journey.
    • We are positive that together we can reach the funding goal. If not, the funds will go, again for the publication of the book because this book is destined to come out to the world one way or the other.
    • The book aims to launch in as many countries as possible starting from the US.

    THE IMPACT OF THIS BOOK as it comes from THEM:

    “We know the truth in this book contradicts many people's views and believes on several matters. We do not tell you it is a book to please all, only the ones ready for the change. If one reads with a mind full of doubt, disbelief or anger, they are not to receive our divine assistance through it. Jesus is not accepted by all, and that is alright. In another life, in another time those who now contradict will start again and again until they find the truth. For this, we will only point it to those who are ready, who can change the world and make way for others to follow. You have come a long way to hear us say those words to you and if you accept them and read with an open heart, you will know them. This is the beginning of the rise for humanity. Take the leap and be directed to all you are and all you are created to be. The time is now to bring the change that most desire. The rise began, the change is here, the love exists and conquers all." --The angels


    THIS IS HOW SPECIAL THIS BOOK IS:

     This book is one of a kind since it provides metaphysical  answers, explains the science behind the universe and the law of attraction, offer exercises for improvement, as well as for manifesting one's desires in all in small and to the point chapters directly from the angel in their narration.

    • It ensures a deeper connection with the self as it promotes feelings of inner peace, reassurance and inspiration.

    • It offers pure energetic vibrations and light energy due to the power of words, lessons as well as angelic presence.

    • It provides proof of angelic existence by being a direct narration from above.

    • It captures the readers' attention as it answers many critical questions for humanity and assists one understand creation and all that exists in the cosmos.

    • It presents the reality of the law of attraction and the science behind the power to manifest.

    • It offers a variety of techniques and exercises to assist the readers achieve a harmonious life and manifest their dreams.

    • It expands awareness beyond the human sphere as it offers views and explanations of beings beyond the three dimensional environment.

    • It awakens the power within and promises to bring the readers to their own spiritual awakening by revealing the truth that exists.

    • With careful word usage, inspirational ideas and truth, it holds positive energy and attitude that conveys to the reader.

    • It creates a bond with the angels, with God and with one's higher self by speaking their words and assisting one in finding their own.

    • It brings the reader in perspective and determination to change, to be better, to grow and to fulfill their life's purpose by finding their power within.

    HOW DO I KNOW IT IS REALLY FROM THE ANGELS?

    I have asked the angels "How do I prove the validity of the book, to others, to me?" This is their answer:
    "What feelings do you receive when you read the words? Do not let others tell you what to think; be guided from within. Are you attracted to the words? Do you receive divine frequency, are you happier, grateful? Do you resonate with it; do the truths make sense to you in a way you cannot explain? So there you will know."

    Risks & Challenges

    Traditional publication through literary agents and editors of publishing companies is difficult, especially for this book. There are those who do not believe in angels, the world change, this book. How can we trust them to bring this book safely to all of you? Self publication is the right path to take because it ensures that the messages of the angels are not altered. It ensures it will reach you as quickly as possible and reach as many as possible. This way, we have control, and our intention is to benefit all of you. Help us succeed.

    FOR MORE DETAILS VISIT OUR WEBSITE: WEBSITE

    LIKE US ON FACEBOOK: OUR PAGE

     

    MEET THE AUTHOR:

      am 26, I have a degree in English literature and I haven't written a book before. I am just like you, I do not consider myself special or different since all can achieve spiritual communication as the book perfectly describes. I was not born with the clairaudient ability, but I achieved it through meditation. One day while in meditation I requested to connect with my divinity and the voice that came soon after came clearly through my own inner hearing "We are here connecting with you now. Do not be afraid, all is well". Soon after I crafted the ability by connecting the same way with the angels, spirit guides and ascended masters. The high frequency,  happy emotion and unconditional love they pass on makes me not doubt their good energies and intentions. I know what you are thinking and I always ask to be protected before any connection with the spirit realm. Fortunately, I only have experiences with pure and loving spirits and I assure you this book is the outcome of such connections. This book now is part of my life purpose and I know I am destined to help many by bringing it to the world. When the angels asked me to write it I had no doubt that it would be the right thing. Now few months later I am so proud  of it and eager for all of you to read it. I Believe in this book because it provides genuine truth on how the world is, how it was created and everyday exercises and techniques to make our life better and manifest our desires. This book overwhelms with positive energy. I find myself reading it over and over to get good energy and higher connection. What I really want is to fulfill my life's purpose and help as many people as possible. This is only the beginning and I am sure more ways will follow.

    oh and I love painting here is my latest artwork:

    Do you want to know more about me? Don't be shy ask away!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    There are a few other ways you can support this book.

    • Get the word out, make some noise about this campaign. Spread the word, help us reach the goal.
    • Use indiegogo's sharing tools.
    • Do you have the experience of self - publication? I can use the advice. Email me at connectwithyourangels@yahoo.com



    THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT

    And that's all there is to it.

    video credits:

    audio from: http://www.bensound.com/

    videos from: https://videos.pexels.com/

story:
Who is Blue Monday Review?

Amanda Hamilton (front row, second from left) set out originally to create a magazine full of prose, poetry, essays, and artwork that were both excellent in craft and fun to read.

In less than two years, that idea has blossomed into something incredible. The response to Blue Monday Review’s vision -- as well as its admiration for our inspiration, Kurt Vonnegut -- was immediate. Submissions poured into our email account and soon, a dedicated group of volunteers joined the BMR bandwagon to help. 

Together, we worked our butts off to elevate and expand every aspect of the magazine’s production. Today the quality of Blue Monday Review is equal to or above that of any magazine in publication. 

What We Need & What You Get

As we grow, so does our vision. The next big goal on our horizon is to become a non-profit organization. With 501(c)(3) status, we will have access to resources which will in turn allow us to expand into our real passion, supporting the Kansas City community. We love KC and we want to help its local literary community continue to flourish and strengthen. We plan to use our passion for literature to create programs for KC schools, and the community at large, to encourage writing and reading in all stages of life. 

In order to achieve this goal, we will need a minimum of $3000. This total is broken down as follows:

a. $400 IRS filing fee.

b. $25 Missouri state filing fee.

c. $1500 Attorney fees.

d. $200 Incorporation fees 

e. The rest of the money will be used to produce the rewards offered to our supporters, such as the t-shirts, mugs and pins pictured below, as well as shipping costs, and campaign marketing.

If we do not reach our minimum goal, your generous contributions will be placed in a special funding account, to be used to file for non-profit status as soon as we have saved the remaining needed funds. Rewards, however, will arrive as scheduled. 

If our generous followers have chosen to bless us with contributions totaling more than our minimum goal of $3000, we will use the additional funds for the following projects:

a. Maintain membership to sites like Submittable that make it easier for great writers to submit stories for review.

b. Printing hard copies of each issue of Blue Monday Review for schools, libraries and other organizations whose patrons may enjoy our unique take on literature.

c. Keeping the lights on. Energy is needed to run our computers, and keep the lights on as our band of volunteers works to reach our publication goals, and brainstorm great ideas for future issues of Blue Monday Review.

What will you get? The glorious satisfaction of helping a great magazine take the next step towards maturity, helping to showcase new talent, and, of course, one of our fantastic rewards! Take a look and see what you like.

Our Vision & Mission

Blue Monday Review seeks to publish the very best, award-winning creative content. Work from around the world that needs to be experienced. 

We do this by championing literary excellence by publishing compelling creative work that has purpose and power. We celebrate art from around the world and support writers and artists in the Kansas City community by challenging them to create, polish and publish through our KC Creators feature, and we will create programming to promote craft development and literary excellence. 

Risks & Challenges

RISK: The IRS may fail to approve our non-profit status application. We're confident that won't happen, but it is always a possibility. If this happens, our goals and vision will remain the same. We will simply have to find a different road to making it all happen. 

CHALLENGES: Filling out a 501(c)(3) form is complex and challenging. We have a lawyer who is competent and enthusiastic about our magazine's vision. They will help with the daunting task of filling out the forms correctly, and making sure all our i's are dotted and t's crossed. 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help by spreading the word! Send a shout out to friends and family. This can be done easily with Indiegogo's share tools. Also, connect with us on Facebook (Blue Monday Review), Twitter (@BluMondayReview), and Youtube (BluMondayReview). Help promote literary excellence!

Here's a look at some of our rewards!


Vol. 2, Num. 2 -- Included in most of our reward levels

BMR Logo Shirt

BMR Vonnegut Head Shirt

BMR Logo Mug


Short Story Collection By Pushcart Prize Nominated Author Jim Doering

Night Sky at Union Station, copyright 2015 Jenny Sande

were both excellent in craft and fun to read.

butts off to elevate and expand every aspect of the magazine’s production. Today the quality of Blue Monday Review is equal to or above that of any
magazine in publication. 
   What We Need & What You Get 

As we grow, so does our vision. The next big goal on our horizon is to become a non-profit
organization. With 501(c)(3) status, we will have access to resources which will in turn allow us to expand into our real passion,
supporting the Kansas City community. We love KC and we want to help its local literary community continue to flourish and strengthen. We plan to use our passion
for literature to create programs for KC schools, and the community at large, to encourage
writing and reading in all stages of life. 
In order to
achieve this goal, we will need a minimum of $3000. This total is broken down as follows:a. $400 IRS filing fee.b. $25 Missouri state filing fee.c. $1500 Attorney fees.d. $200 Incorporation fees e. The rest of the money will be used to produce the rewards offered to our supporters, such as the t-shirts, mugs and pins pictured below, as well as shipping costs, and campaign marketing.If we do not reach our minimum goal, your generous contributions will be placed in a special funding account, to be used to file for non-profit status as soon as we have saved the remaining needed funds. Rewards, however, will arrive as scheduled. If our generous followers have chosen to bless us with contributions totaling more than our minimum goal of $3000, we will use the additional funds for the following projects:a. Maintain membership to sites like Submittable that make it easier for great writers to submit stories for review.b. Printing hard copies of each issue of Blue Monday Review for schools, libraries and other organizations whose patrons may enjoy our unique take on literature.c. Keeping the lights on. Energy is needed to run our computers, and keep the lights on as our band of volunteers works to reach our publication goals, and brainstorm great ideas for future issues of Blue Monday Review.What will you get? The glorious satisfaction of helping a great magazine take the next step towards maturity, helping to showcase new talent, and, of course, one of our fantastic rewards! Take a look and see what you like.Our Vision & Mission
Blue Monday Review seeks to publish the very best, award-winning creative content. Work from around the world that needs to be experienced. 
We do this by championing literary excellence by publishing compelling creative work that has purpose and power. We celebrate art from around the world and support writers and artists in the Kansas City community by challenging them to create, polish and publish through our KC Creators feature, and we will create programming to promote craft development and literary excellence. 
Risks & Challenges
RISK: The IRS may fail to approve our non-profit status application. We're confident that won't happen, but it is always a possibility. If this happens, our goals and vision will remain the same. We will simply have to find a different road to making it all happen. CHALLENGES: Filling out a 501(c)(3) form is complex and challenging. We have a lawyer who is competent and enthusiastic about our magazine's vision. They will help with the daunting task of filling out the forms correctly, and making sure all our i's are dotted and t's crossed. Other Ways You Can HelpYou can help by spreading the word! Send a shout out to friends and family. This can be done easily with Indiegogo's share tools. Also, connect with us on Facebook (Blue Monday Review), Twitter (@BluMondayReview), and Youtube (BluMondayReview). Help promote literary excellence!Here's a look at some of our rewards!

Vol. 2, Num. 2 -- Included in most of our reward levelsBMR Logo ShirtBMR Vonnegut Head ShirtBMR Logo MugShort Story Collection By Pushcart Prize Nominated Author Jim DoeringNight Sky at Union Station, copyright 2015 Jenny Sande

story:
Note: Please click the following link for the UK-friendly version of the campaign!

About The Moors

Book Blurb

                     The call was disturbing, but as far as investigatory              
            journalist Amanda Connors was concerned, it had to be fate.

            Inadvertently, it was the years of abuse during her childhood
           that led her into journalism and to now receive an anonymous
         tip-off claiming negligence within a children’s care home offered
                            the chance to finally put the past behind her. 

       It was the winter of 1972 when she journeyed from London to Devon
                to pursue the lead, though she would only learn one thing.

                                    Some secrets are better left buried.


Project Summary

Hi there!

I'm Jody Medland and I am a professional writer who is equally as passionate about books as I am about film.

Pen Works Media was formed in 2011 with the intention of finding original stories and bringing them to modern readers. Ten e-books and over 3,000 downloads later, we have established a great readership community and are now gearing up for the launch of our first paperback book, The Moors.


This project is hugely important to myself as a writer and the company as a whole because it will help us deliver content to more readers and subsequently build our fanbase for all future releases. 

Mission statement
To seek, educate and nurture talent in both literature and screenwriting, creating and publishing original works that will challenge and alter people’s perceptions of the world.

The mission starts now and by contributing to the project, you can help make it happen.


What We Need & What You Get

For the past 9-months myself, digital content manager Michael Pengelly, graphic designer Paul Newsome and proofreader/photographer Prima Patel have been working hard to get The Moors ready for the marketplace. 

We are very nearly ready, but there is still a great deal of effort needed in regards to designs (for posters, special edition book covers, etc) and marketing (arranging radio spots, magazine column inches, online interviews, etc).

We are currently £3,000 short of what's needed to give the book the best possible chance of commercial success. In the instance we don't quite reach our goal, we have many plan B scenarious set up, so your money won't be wasted. However, it will mean less slots on the radio to smaller audiences and more sporadic news coverage when the book is actually released.

We have spent time looking at what people like to receive in return for financial contributions. It seems that people enjoy tangible rewards that they get to hold and, more importantly, are able to use. Therefore, we have taken care to create things that:

  • Connect you to the project
  • Provide you with collector's items
  • Make you a part of our community
  • Associate you with a growing company
We have created things such as a pack of Top Trumps based on the book's characters, special edition posters and book covers that very few people in the world will own.

What's more, for every supporter that purchases The Moors, 5% of the sale will be donated to Barnardo's, who have partnered with us for the launch, so not only can you contribute to a cool project and get some great souvenirs, but you can help unfortunate children towards a brighter future in the process.

Remember, it's not just The Moors that will benefit from your contributions but all books created by Pen Works Media in the future.

Note: It has been known for some backers to prefer the entirety of their contribution to be used for the cause. If you would rather we use all of your money for the campaign as opposed to dedicating a percentage of it towards your gifts, simply let me know via e-mail once you have pledged.


Why You Should Trust Us

I am an award-winning writer who has worked successfully across the advertising, corporate, education, film, gaming and literary industries. I possess a great deal of vision that supports my writing ability.

Likewise, Pen Works Media started with a project titled The Emerging Light Series, which saw us teach creative writing and promote the value of original storytelling throughout the UK. Within the company's first year, we published 17 first-time authors, creating 100 short stories and selling over 3,000 books using only social media for our marketing.

The intent is there for all to see, and if you love original books, you can really help take the company and many future writers, to the next level.


Challenges

There are more books being released on an annual basis than ever before and entering a new product can be a rather daunting process. However, the challenge remains the same - making people aware of the great product we have produced among the mass of options available.

Marketing The Moors is every bit as important as actually writing it and by contributing to our IndieGogo campaign, you are providing us with three solutions:

  • Providing us with collateral to market our book
  • Increasing project visibility by allowing people see your pledge
  • Contributing to word-of-mouth marketing (provided you enjoy it!)


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to help financially but you like what you see, there are still a number of things you can do to help:

  • Share this campaign on your social media channels
  • Request a free copy of The Moors (applicable to online book reviewers)
  • Visit penworksmedia.co.uk and add your views to any relevant articles
  • Subscribe to the Pen Works Media newsletter

The important thing is that our reading community grows. The company web site acts as a portal where readers can communicate directly with our authors, so as long as our readership is expanding, we're happy!


If We Reach Our Target

In the event we do reach our target, please keep your donations coming all the way up until the deadline. The more people involved in this journey, the better it is for everybody involved. Unless restrictions are stated, we can provide the listed rewards to any number of people and your money will simply be used to broaden our advertising campaign.

Any support is hugely appreciated, so thank you so much for your time.

JODY MEDLAND
Pen Works Media

story:
Hello my name is Helen Coppage. I am a mother of three and first time author. I live in beautiful Oregon. Thank you so much for taking the time to look at my campaign. The money raised will go towards the publication, illustrations, and marketing  of "JACK, A SAFE PLACE PLACE TO CALL HOME". A portion of each book sold will be donated to child help a non-profit charity aiding victims of child abuse. 

This is a story about a young boy who so desperately wanted a safe place to call home. In the middle of constant fighting, Jack feels alone and stuck in the middle. Dealing with self-blame and questioning whether the fighting is his fault. Jack comes to learn he is not alone, and eventually finds his safe place called home.

"Jack, A Safe Place To Call Home" Is an inspired book written to uplift your child. Having grown up in a home where my parents didn't always agree and have gone through a divorce in my adult life, I personally have experienced the impact these types of situations have on a child. 

 My hope is to get copy of "Jack, A  Safe Place To Call Home" into the hands of every parent that's going through a separation. 

Most parents, after a separation just don’t know where to start, or what to say. So they often won’t say anything for fear of saying the wrong thing. This can leave the child filling in the blanks and they start to believe it’s them. Kids are great at self-blaming and making it their fault, especially in situations they feel are out of their control.

Every child is deserving of a happy healthy home where they feel loved, accepted and safe. 

God is my publisher

      Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please help me get the word out and make some noise about my campaign, click share!
