story:
I’m Ange Bahizi Entrepreneur/Editor and founder of Real Love Magazine, I am originally from East Africa, Rwanda. I live in New York City now. I am a Big dreamer and I came to fulfill the American dream of opportunity. I grew up with my beautiful family of 8 children and have always loved to create stories and inspire people. One of my dreams is to create my own magazine "Real Love" and make it nation and worldwide.

Real Love Magazine is a unique never before love story magazine and lifestyle, that tells you love story from real people through images and real characters.

In a magazine world fixated on drama, scandal and lies, my vision for "Real Love" is to break the mold with a unique comic style presentation depicting real life and love storis with real characters.

 My magazine is about  love, inspiration and moral advice.  Real Love magazine will teach and inspire. It's about loving one another and most of all loving yourself inside and out.   I aim for the majority of our magazine’s stories to be true stories from different couples.

I see Real Love Magazine as a nation and worldwide magazine. A family that will inspire you because we are telling stories in a unique way where images tells a story, from different characters who are like you. We hope to create something people can relate to and learn from. Our upcoming stories that will have advice for single, lonely and hopeless people that are out there, who believe that love doesn’t exist anymore and question themselves on what to do to find that one and special person.

 We are here for you and we are here to stay and grow with you. I encourage our readers to tell us their story if they have  an inspirational story to tell. If their stories could help millions people, we want to hear and share their story through images and real characters, because we are more than a family. We are based in NYC but we’re hoping to grow soon to become nation and worldwide.

It is my full time job and we’re all working very hard to get Real Love Magazine out soon. We are a family and we love our readers. I guarantee that I can do this.

MONEY WE WANT TO RAISE

We are raising $30.000 for Your funds will help us to hire employees as. I need help, get an office space, print the first issue, distribution/circulation, building an app Advertising and build a strong social media. with your help and my hard working I will make this magazine nation and worldwide. We are a family in love and heath life that we will be giving you every month.

Thank you so much for your support.  God bless you

visit our website: www.reallovemag.com

Twitter: @Reallovemag

story:
The Writing from your Soul Workshop in Maui, Hawaii will be a Hay House sponsored event June 12-14, 2015. The speakers sharing their tips and tricks on writing will be the amazing Dr. Wayne Dyer, Doreen Virtue, Nancy Levin and Reid Tracy. Hay House Publishing will be giving away a publishing contract with a $10,000 advance. I feel this workshop will help my book get published so I can have the power to influence and impact lives. My book is going to be on the topic that so important to every single living thing on this planet, and that is happiness and I am a firm believer that books change lives. Depression seems to be a big problem now a days and my book will certainly help those who suffer and to encourage those who are already happy and healthy. I am an aspiring writer and future life coach. I am currently working on my book proposal and would like to gain the insights from the best writers,  this beautiful world has to offer.

I will need the money to fly there, lodge and to pay for the workshop. Costs will be approximately $2500.

My goal is contact 500 people to donate $5 each. Thank you for believing in me and supporting my dream.  I love you all.

story:
Following is about Anthony Marr and his work. It comprises three parts:

Part 1:  Awards won by Anthony Marr as an activist - in animal rights, animal welfare, wildlife preservation and environmentalism.

Part 2:  Accolades won by Anthony Marr as a scientist and a philosopher - for his new science-based philosophical system [The Omnsicentific Cosmology] and his book [OMNI-SCIENCE and the Human Destiny] - his first book of five.

Part 3:  Readers' comments on the first 6 chapters (among 50) of [BEAUTIFUL LIFE].


PART 1 (of 3) - Awards in Activism


Anthony Marr is winner of the prestigious Henry Spira Grassroots Activist Award at the 2010 Animal Rights National Conference in Washington DC, for his "outstanding contribution to animal liberation".


Not coincidentally, he was also honored with the BEST ALL-AROUND ACTIVIST AWARD by Negotiation Is Over in the same year, with the following accolade: 


"Whether protecting tiger reserves in India, risking his life in undercover investigations of the illegal trade in endangered species parts; challenging any and all forms of hunting; hosting a radio show; writing visionary books on science, philosophy, and cosmology; embarking on marathon coast-to-coast Compassion for Animals Road Expeditions each covering 30-40 US states  in 4-7 months, or mobilizing scientific research to awaken the complacent to the imminent dangers of irreversible ecological crisis, Anthony Marr is raising awareness, effectively campaigning, and blazing new trails. In 1999, he founded Heal Our Planet Earth (HOPE), and in 2003, he launched the Global Anti-Hunting Coalition.

"For anyone skeptical of what one person can do alone or in strategic alliance with others, or what can be accomplished without the large bankrolls such as HSUS commands (and squanders), look no further. For Marr shows what great things can blossom from intelligence, independence, courage, and unqualified commitment to the rights of nature, free from the predatory violence of Homo sapiens. The story Marr tells, and the outcome for which he fights, is not a zero-sum tragedy that pits one element of nature against another, however, but achieves a harmonization of life forces. “If we win,” Marr says, “we will have elevated the quality of Humanity, and brought about a major quantum leap in human social evolution.” - NIH


PART 2 (of 3) - Accolades for OMNI-SCIENCE


In 1977, during a solo camping trip in Africa, Anthony Marr conceived of what he calls the Omniscientific Cosmology - subject matter of his first book [OMNI-SCIENCE and the Humanity Destiny] and of his third book [The Fortunate and the Called Upon], which has since won high approval from top academics in diverse fields:


From University of California at Berkeley:

Institute of Human Origins, Dr. William H. Kimbel, President: “… a profound contribution to the fundamental definition of humankind in relation to the broader universe... unifies the fragmented Western scientific disciplines… implications of great depth and breadth for the future course of human actions… too important to ignore.”

Anthropology, Dr. Tim White: "... Anthony Marr's OMNI-SCIENCE is formidable..."

Astronomy and Physics, Dr. Marc Davis: “… a forward looking moral framework… an important contribution to society…”

Paleontology, Dr. Carole S. Hickman: “… an extraordinary intellectual undertaking… unique… intellectually and aesthetically stimulating… a bold and eclectic piece of scholarship… exceptional… a delight… optimism, concern and compassion for humanity…”

Botany, Dr. Herbert G. Baker: “… extremely interesting… an important contribution towards understanding cosmology.”

Paleontology, Dr. Donald E. Savage: “… powerful… erudite synthesis...”

Zoology, Dr. Richard C. Strohman: “… original… a thoroughly logical system… might indeed fill a large gap in the way we think...”

Biology, Dr. Richard W. Holms: “… a remarkably broad perspective… great depth... truly deserves the name OMNI-SCIENCE…”


From Stanford University:

Geology, Dr. W.R. Evitt: “… sincerity, imagination, intellectualism and scholarship… an immensely logical construct… meticulously thought out… majestic in scope but intrinsically simple, satisfying and optimistic… should have a very broad appeal… these are important ideas with great potential for lessening the conflicts in a troubled world…”

Sociology, Dr. Alex Inkeles: “… impressed me not only with the quality of his presentation, but also the quality of his thinking… authoritative… exceptionally comprehensive…”

Philosophy, Dr. John Dupre: “… extremely intriguing and provocative… incomparably more edifying than the vast majority of such attempts…”

Anthropology, Dr. John W. Rick: “… very thought provoking… clearly deserves extensive discussion… a serious, well-founded vision…”

Physics, Dr. Leonard Susskind: “… I found myself stimulated, educated… worth listening to, even for those of us who are not of the same philosophical bent…”

Philosophy, Dr. John Bogart: “… compelling… have moral import…”

Applied Physics and Astrophysics, Dr. Vahe Petrosian: “… elaborate… clearly well thought out and researched… fascinating… a very ambitious task… a beautiful synthesis… captivating… should be of interest not only to experts but to all thinking people of the world…”

-----------------------------------

More accolades from University of Oregon, University of Washington and University of British Columbia (Anthony Marr's alumni university).


On his 70th birthday (2014-02-25), several people independently asked him to write his autobiography. Initially resistant to the idea, he finally relented, and BEAUTIFUL LIFE is the result, 



PART 3 (of 3)  - Readers' feedback for the first 6 chapters (of 50)



Macx Dayshy Adams:  Many people say, " I should write a book about my life" and many say " you should write a book". When you hear the second, that's the best indication that you probably should !

Charlene Sjoberg:  Your Chinese name means Beautiful Life?! Awesome, Anthony!

Rajee Seetharam:  Love your mom's stories and what she had passed on to you... You wake up the world...

Bernadette Barbour:  You are their legacy, and some legacy you are!

Sandra Wilkinson:  You surely are a Renaissance Man! Brilliant. You are beautiful, and anything that you put your hand to will come out just the same.

Ãrchi Sehgal:  So beautifully and perfectly written...

Domenica Ventura:  I have found much insight in all your writings, and always look forward to more!

Susan Lynn Fillipow:  you have lived many lives....

Jolanta Sobecka:  I'm glad you are writing your autobiography Anthony! Looking forward to the next chapter!

Samuel O Lee:  Very interesting... the free history lesson! I've long been interested in learning more about Confucius, Lao Tzu and the evolution of China, so this was an informative, albeit brief, introduction to this fascinating subject.

Andie VanderHoek:  You are a brilliant man... fascinating read...

Barb Overton:  Enjoyed reading this; looking forward to the next chapter!

Domenica Ventura:  Looking forward to this evening to continue this fascinating thread...

Rajee Seetharam:  ...you are great man... with such profound thinking .... May Mother Earth bless you and people understand and stand with you .... I am!!

Cindy McDannell:  Beautiful! I feel like I was there...

Nakia Anderson:  Anthony, your mother was a beautiful woman and I am very glad that she was able to survive such horror! I'm sure she would be proud of the wonderful man you have become. Your writings are a very important and well done part of educating others about history and honoring the victims. And thank you for sharing part of your life, your  writings and insight with us...

Gay Maveety:  Holy smokes! What a story!

Karen V. Stefanini:  Thank you for sharing this heart wrenching yet inspiring story of your heritage and beautiful mother.

Janet Zimmermann Snyder:  I too often think how cruel men are. I love stories where they are heros. As the woman was. Your mother must have been the most beautiful woman in the village. It's wonderful she escaped and met your father. You and your family's story should be a movie. I'm hooked!

Becky Combe Daigle:  Your mother was a very beautiful woman and I know how highly you speak of her. I thank God she was able to escape. I can't imagine what she went through.

Brie Inglesby:  Riveting!

Chandrika Gadiewasam:  Oh my goodness. I am speechless!

Melissa Maura:  I am filled with emotion and amazement. Nothing surprises me when it comes to the horrors of mankind, but this particular time and space in history I knew nothing about. Thank you for your reflections and insight and tribute to your mother. It is magnificently written and I am deeply appreciative of your sharing it. I shall read it over and over. Hugs, love and respect... By the way, your Mum was a classic beauty.

Rochelle Mons-Larson:  These tragedies should never be forgotten. Bless your mother for being strong, escaping & moving on and very thankful that soldier assisted. Continue to share her story & that of others.

Margaret Eschmann:  What an incredible story...

Ian Ionian:  Very compelling. Glad that you walk among us and a happy mothers day to your beautiful strong proud mother.... awe inspiring and informative! Your vivid memory astounds and is very... awesome!!

Jessica Rath:  I had never heard about the Comfort Women. Thank you for sharing the story of your mother; what a legacy you have. No wonder you spend your life defending innocent creatures.

Gracie Wagg:  You are such a credit to humanity Anthony Marr. May the long time sun shine upon you, all love surround you, and the pure light within you, guide your way on.

Patty Beecham:  ... a wonderfully told story...

Anne Orman:  That is an amazing account of your family Anthony.My own mother had her own house in London bombed around her when she was 12 years old and was left with only what she was wearing,covered in coal dust because they had hidden in the cupboard under the stairs.I resented this story as I was growing up because my mother told every friend I ever brought home but it is only now that I am nearly 50 years old that I understand how terribly frightening it would have been for her.

Rajee Seetharam:  ... a beautiful story... straight from the heart and so has a lot of soul...

Joanne Sallows:  ... such an amazing piece of writing...

Karin Saks:  Am thoroughly enjoying your writing.

Nakia Anderson:  Beautifully written Anthony! You are a gifted writer. Thank you for sharing it. I would like to read your entire book.

Irene Stepaniak Nieves:  Such an amazing journey of 7 decades beautifully written. May your life be blessed and filled with so much love today and always.

Felicity Jackson:  Superb piece of writing. I loved Tan Twan Eng's books, The Gift of Rain and The Garden of Evening Mists, both set (through flashbacks) in this era, so really appreciate the chance to read this!

Valerie Warburton:  Even with my ADHD I did not want to stop reading this story,..

Paris Harvey:  Delighted to read the story about the man.

Margaret Eschmann: What happens next?!



A book-page has been set up for BEAUTIFUL LIFE in Facebook, into which have been uploaded all chapters (48) of the book but the last two which are still being worked on. Please feel free to check it out to see what the readers are so enthusiastic about and enthused by.

https://www.facebook.com/Beautiful.Life.by.Anthony.Marr

If you believe that this book should be widely read, please MAKE A CONTRIBUTION towards its birth. Whether you can donate or not, please SHARE THIS APPEAL far and wide.

The amount targeted is for 1,000 copies of the first edition. If the full amount is not reached, whatever raised will go towards producing a reduced number of copies. 
 

A longer term goal is to form a publishing company to produce subsequent editions of [BEAUTIFUL LIFE], as well as paperback versions of the other titles by Anthony Marr, including [The Fortunate and the Called Upon], [ANTI-HUNTER - Battle of the Century], and [The Omniscientific Cosmology].

Please also join Anthony Marr's social network if not yet:

https://www.facebook.com/AnthonyMarr001

Thank you and take care.
story_txt:
Following is about Anthony Marr and his work. It comprises three parts:Part 1:  Awards won by Anthony Marr as an activist - in animal rights, animal welfare, wildlife preservation and environmentalism.Part 2:  Accolades won by Anthony Marr as a scientist and a philosopher - for his new science-based philosophical system [The Omnsicentific Cosmology] and his book [OMNI-SCIENCE and the Human Destiny] - his first book of five.Part 3:  Readers' comments on the first 6 chapters (among 50) of [BEAUTIFUL LIFE].
PART 1 (of 3) - Awards in Activism
Anthony Marr is winner of the prestigious Henry Spira Grassroots 
Activist Award at the 2010 Animal Rights National Conference in 
Washington DC, for his "outstanding contribution to animal liberation".

Not coincidentally, he was also honored with the BEST ALL-AROUND ACTIVIST AWARD by Negotiation Is Over in the same year, with the following accolade:  
"Whether protecting tiger reserves in India, risking his life in 
undercover investigations of the illegal trade in endangered species 
parts; challenging any and all forms of hunting; hosting a radio show; 
writing visionary books on science, philosophy, and cosmology; embarking
 on marathon coast-to-coast Compassion for Animals Road Expeditions 
each covering 30-40 US states  in 4-7 months,
or mobilizing scientific research to awaken the complacent to the 
imminent dangers of irreversible ecological crisis, Anthony Marr is 
raising awareness, effectively campaigning, and blazing new trails. In 
1999, he founded Heal Our Planet Earth (HOPE), and in 2003, he launched the Global 
Anti-Hunting Coalition.


"For anyone skeptical of what one person can do alone or 
in strategic alliance with others, or what can be accomplished without 
the large bankrolls such as HSUS commands (and squanders), look no 
further. For Marr shows what great things can blossom from intelligence,
 independence, courage, and unqualified commitment to the rights of 
nature, free from the predatory violence of Homo sapiens. The story Marr
 tells, and the outcome for which he fights, is not a zero-sum tragedy 
that pits one element of nature against another, however, but achieves a
 harmonization of life forces. “If we win,” Marr says, “we will have 
elevated the quality of Humanity, and brought about a major quantum leap
 in human social evolution.” - NIH

PART 2 (of 3) - Accolades for OMNI-SCIENCE
In 1977, during a solo camping trip in Africa, Anthony Marr conceived
 of what he calls the Omniscientific Cosmology - subject matter of his 
first book [OMNI-SCIENCE and the Humanity Destiny] and of his third book [The Fortunate and the Called Upon], which has since won 
high approval from top academics in diverse fields: 


From University of California at Berkeley:Institute of Human Origins, Dr. William H. Kimbel,
President:  “… a profound contribution to the fundamental
definition of humankind in relation to the broader universe...
unifies the fragmented Western scientific disciplines… implications
of great depth and breadth for the future course of human actions…
too important to ignore.”Anthropology, Dr. Tim White: "... Anthony Marr's OMNI-SCIENCE is formidable..."Astronomy and Physics, Dr. Marc Davis:  “… a forward
looking moral framework… an important contribution to society…”Paleontology, Dr. Carole S. Hickman:  “… an
extraordinary intellectual undertaking… unique… intellectually
and aesthetically stimulating… a bold and eclectic piece of
scholarship… exceptional… a delight… optimism, concern and
compassion for humanity…”Botany, Dr. Herbert G. Baker:  “… extremely
interesting… an important contribution towards understanding
cosmology.”Paleontology, Dr. Donald E. Savage:  “… powerful…
erudite synthesis...”Zoology, Dr. Richard C. Strohman:  “… original… a
thoroughly logical system… might indeed fill a large gap in the way
we think...”Biology, Dr. Richard W. Holms:  “… a remarkably
broad perspective… great depth... truly deserves the name
OMNI-SCIENCE…”

From Stanford University:

Geology,
Dr. W.R. Evitt:  “… sincerity, imagination, intellectualism and
scholarship… an immensely logical construct… meticulously thought
out… majestic in scope but intrinsically simple, satisfying and
optimistic… should have a very broad appeal… these are important
ideas with great potential for lessening the conflicts in a troubled
world…”

Sociology,
Dr. Alex Inkeles:  “… impressed me not only with the quality of
his presentation, but also the quality of his thinking…
authoritative… exceptionally comprehensive…”
Philosophy,
Dr. John Dupre:  “… extremely intriguing and provocative…
incomparably more edifying than the vast majority of such attempts…”
Anthropology,
Dr. John W. Rick:  “… very thought provoking… clearly deserves
extensive discussion… a serious, well-founded vision…”
Physics,
Dr. Leonard Susskind:  “… I found myself stimulated, educated…
worth listening to, even for those of us who are not of the same
philosophical bent…”
Philosophy,
Dr. John Bogart:  “… compelling… have moral import…”
Applied
Physics and Astrophysics, Dr. Vahe Petrosian:  “… elaborate…
clearly well thought out and researched… fascinating… a very
ambitious task… a beautiful synthesis… captivating… should be
of interest not only to experts but to all thinking people of the
world…” 
-----------------------------------
More accolades from University of Oregon, University of Washington and 
University of British Columbia (Anthony Marr's alumni university).



On his 70th birthday (2014-02-25), several people independently 
asked him to write his autobiography. Initially resistant to the idea, 
he finally relented, and BEAUTIFUL LIFE is the result,

story:
Dear friends, we are pleased to share with you our guide-book about interesting and cheap way travel to Ibiza.

We are travelers, backpackers. We are not rich and we don’t care about luxury stuff… Travelling is the most important thing for us. We know wild beaches, where the best drinks are poured, the organic food are served, where authentic, local places are.

Merging with the cities, we become a part of mega-cities; reaching the clouds, we breathe with the purest air. We seize smells and memorize tastes, leisurely feeling the life. Freedom knows no compromises - the freedom must be an absolute. This is our religion.

We are two ordinary girls, who like travelling. We are often asked, how we manage to travel so much with a minimal budget. But we know without any doubts that traveling is an incredible adventure and lots of positive emotions! We began to breathe with freedom the day we’d abandoned conventions and rules. And we will share with you our philosophy and secrets. We will show you how to make budget journeies.

We have already released a website, where there is information about the most interesting places over the World you can visit for free. At the moment the website is presented in Russian, but it will be available in English soon, we are working on that. Check it here www.friby.ru

And we keep travelling. The next destination is Ibiza!

Most of the people are sure that Ibiza is only nightclubs and costly life. Fortunately, it is not true! The island has a lot of interesting, beautiful and, most importantly, budget places! We will tell you all the secrets of this fascinating place and debunk myths. We will open for You another Ibiza. You will discover rich history of the island, most of 56 secret beaches, hippy places and etc. And you will get priceless advice on how to make amazing vacation on Ibiza with small budget.

What will it be?

It is a guide book «Another Ibiza for 5€». Good quality book with lots of pictures, 1000 copies. There will be 5 topics:

- Culture and history

- Food

- Parties

- Secret beaches

- Amazing places

Every topic will have more than 10 points to visit with cost less than 5euro. Every place will have detailed description: name, address, how to get there information, our tips.

During our trip we will make diary videos and will share with You the most interesting and important information about Ibiza. Subscribe our Youtube channel. 

We will be very thankful if You join in our project!

How can you help us?

-  Any financial contribution you can make is appreciated

-  Awesome if you share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, via e-mail, etc.

-  You live in Ibiza and can host us

-  If You know Ibiza’s interesting places for less than 5€, please share with us the information

Campaign goals

Our goals are to raise $5,750 and publishing the book at the October 2015. 

Where money will go?

- Printing of 1,000 copies

- Editing & Proofreading 

- Page-proofs

- Paying taxes

- Perks 

- Indiegogo charges fee 

What perks are available:

1$ - Thank You for supporting us! You make World easier for travelling.

3$ - We will send You a postcard from the island!

5$ - A postcard with our kisses 

10$ - A postcard by Your choice + Your name with our heartful Thanks in the guidebook

20$ - A postcard by Your choice + Your name with our heartful Thanks in the guidebook + Tank top «What Happens In Ibiza Stays In Ibiza» we send You from the Island. (For males black/white coloring titles)


30$ - Your name with Thanks in a guide-book + printed guide-book “Another Ibiza for 5€”

35$ - All above (except printed book)+ You first will get full eBook of “Another Ibiza for 5€” (before printed version is released)

40$ - All above (except printed book) + You first will get access to our dairy videos.

50$ - All above + printed guide-book “Another Ibiza for 5€”

300$ - Ad  in the eBook and in the printed book  “Another Ibiza for 5€” (Options discussed individually)

350$ - Your name or Your company name or company logo on the most beautiful view points of Ibiza and send You pictures. We will make it in 3 different places. You will get 3 different pictures. Feel complete freedom! Discover another Ibiza with us!

Feel complete freedom! Discover another Ibiza with us!

story:
Fairy Buns


MY STORY

With a strong desire to make a positive contribution to the world the idea of the “Fairy bun” emerged. Being a seamstress for over 10 years enabled me to create the “Fairy bun” business. I am a passionate spirit with a burning desire for everyone to be a part of my dream and believe that miracles really can come true. I am a New York-er with the a big apple dream!  Running this campaign is a wonderful opportunity for my company to thrive and grow. Although a novice to the small business community I created and started “Fairy buns” to make a statement to people everywhere that dreams are possible. I also created Fairy Buns because I want people worldwide to look and feel good about themselves. Fairy buns enables people to feel confident and bold!

THE FAIRY BUN MISSION: The mission of my company is to make people feel good about the way they look. Looking good makes you feel good! I also aspire to please my customers with an individual one-of-a-kind product that is unique and trendy. The “Fairy Bun” is a way to reach many different walks of life and merge them all with the perfect fashion hair accessory.

 BUSINESS CHALLENGES:  The biggest business challenge that I face today would have to be the delay of necessary adequate financial backing needed to produce products and market my company. With the right amount of finances and supplies to produce more products and further style creations of the “Fairy Bun”, I can be 100% ready and able to service my supporting customers. It can be a hindrance when you don’t have enough finances to meet the supply and demand of your customers. Having sufficient financial backing will allow me to service many individuals.  I would love to be able to offer the “Fairy Bun” to everyone all over the globe. Marketing and public relations are of the utmost importance to any business. With the right marketing and public relations I know that people everywhere will love my product. 

THE FUTURE OF THE FAIRY BUNS: Although my company has attracted a devoted fan base, it is not where I aspire it to be. In the next 2-5 years I would love to take advantage of the fact that the hair accessories market is financially thriving tremendously. With the youth all over the world seeking out the latest trends and accessories I envision my unique and first of its kind hair accessory “Fairy Buns” as a household name not just nationwide but worldwide within the next few years or so. Hair buns right now are a huge fashion must for kids, girls and women. Hair accessories are products that are always needed no matter what era arises. Fashion will always be around and I hope my “Fairy Buns” will be as well.

WHAT WILL BE DONE: A business is created and started from a mere thought but without the substantial finances and marketing it can seem impossible to succeed. With the Indiegogo campaign, businesses like mine are given the chance to rise and become more than what they presently are. Gaining the $10,000 needed to finance supplies will enrich my company and allow me to achieve the financial backing that I aspire to obtain. Having adequate finances allows me to produce more of my product at a faster rate and it will also enable me to develop a long lasting relationship with the Fairy Bun contributors. If funded every contributor will be proud to say they contributed something great to help the Fairy Bun company gain notice of people all around the world. Being a small business owner can often times feel challenging without the right marketing tools necessary to help the growth of the business. What gaining exposure and support from contributors will do is allow me to enhance and strengthen my companies’ vision and values all the while publicly advancing the “Fairy Bun” business.

products and further style creations of the “Fairy Bun”, I can be 100% ready and
able to service my supporting customers. It can be a hindrance when you don’t
have enough finances to meet the supply and demand of your customers. Having
sufficient financial backing will allow me to service many individuals.  I would love to be able to offer the “Fairy
Bun” to everyone all over the globe. Marketing and public relations are of the
utmost importance to any business. With the right marketing and public
relations I know that people everywhere will love my product. THE FUTURE OF THE FAIRY BUNS: Although my
company has attracted a devoted fan base, it is not where I aspire it to be. In
the next 2-5 years I would love to take advantage of the fact that the hair
accessories market is financially thriving tremendously. With the youth all
over the world seeking out the latest trends and accessories I envision my
unique and first of its kind hair accessory “Fairy Buns” as a household name
not just nationwide but worldwide within the next few years or so. Hair buns
right now are a huge fashion must for kids, girls and women. Hair accessories
are products that are always needed no matter what era arises. Fashion will
always be around and I hope my “Fairy Buns” will be as well.
WHAT WILL BE DONE: A
business is created and started from a mere thought but without the substantial
finances and marketing it can seem impossible to succeed. With the Indiegogo campaign, businesses like mine are given the chance to rise and
become more than what they presently are. Gaining the $10,000 needed to finance supplies will enrich my company and allow me to achieve the financial backing
that I aspire to obtain. Having adequate finances allows me to produce more of
my product at a faster rate and it will also enable me to develop a long
lasting relationship with the Fairy Bun contributors. If funded every contributor will be proud to
say they contributed something great to help the Fairy Bun company gain notice
of people all around the world. Being a small business owner can often times
feel challenging without the right marketing tools necessary to help the growth
of the business. What gaining exposure and support from contributors will do is allow me
to enhance and strengthen my companies’ vision and values all the while
publicly advancing the “Fairy Bun” business.

story:
Help Us Share the Word!  #stoptheharm

United Methodist Clergy & Churches Stand for Love

  • Clergy have been officiating same gender weddings for years in our California-Pacific annual conference.  We will continue to do so because we understand the heart of God as infinitely wide, and the rite of marriage to be open to all people.
  • However, many people only see and know the media headlines of UMC clergy trials, defrockings and the denunciation(s) of the LGBTQ community by the United Methodist Church.  #stoptheharm
  • We need to change the headlines and lift our open and inclusive voice of love for all -- boldly, strongly and pervasively.  We need to #stoptheharm and stand up publicly for LOVE in God's church.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are raising $4500 to purchase eye-catching, well-designed printed advertisements in major and regional publications throughout the reaches of our California-Pacific Conference.  We are working directly with Reconciling Ministries Network to design and place the ads.
  • These ads will do two things -- 1) list the names of UMC clergy in our conference that officiate same gender weddings and the churches who will host them; and 2) serve as an invitation to our upcoming October 10 "Come for Love ... Stay for Art" Renewal of Vows Ceremony for the LGBTQ community (in the sanctuary of Pasadena First United Methodist Church).  For more information about that special day, visit:  http://calpacloveforall.eventbrite.com
  • We are seeking to purchase full page ads in the LA Weekly, OC Weekly, Advocate and New Times; and ...
  • Smaller but equally impactful ads in the Los Angeles Times, the Honolulu Star Advertiser, and the San Diego Tribune.
  • San Luis Obispo United Methodist Church (SLOUMC) will act as the financial agent for the event and all funds collected will be handled by SLOUMC. 

Risks & Challenges

  • Printed advertising is costly -- wow, is it ever!  We do have a large goal, but it is a realistic goal to get these ads to press. 
  • Progressive, non-incendiary news doesn't grab headlines. 
  • Both of these challenges have silenced our voice in the past, but no longer ... because we believe Jesus' message of love is mightier than any rhetoric or religious law.  In fact, we not only believe it -- we KNOW it.  Help us step up to this challenge and let our voice be heard.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this campaign!  
  • Help plan the Oct. 10 "Come for Love ... Stay for Art" Renewal of Vows gathering.  Visit:  http://calpacloveforall.eventbrite.com  to learn how.
  • Attend the  Oct. 10 "Come for Love ... Stay for Art" Renewal of Vows gathering.
  • Every single donation, every single share of this campaign helps us change the message from one of hate and exile to one of love and inclusion.

story:
Autumnal City: The Journals of Samuel R. Delany, Volume 2

 

The Project

Samuel R. Delany is one of the most brilliant, stimulating, and uncompromising writers on the contemporary American literary scene. His exuberantly innovative work, which encompasses novels, short stories, criticism, memoir, and graphic novels, has won him the admiration of legions of readers. Some are drawn to his science fiction, some to his work focusing on issues of sexuality and race, some to his literary criticism, and many to the whole vast tapestry of his work. For this work Delany has garnered awards from all over the literary map, including four Nebula Awards and two Hugo Awards, a Lambda Literary Award, the Bill Whitehead Memorial Award for a Lifetime Contribution to Lesbian and Gay Literature, and inclusion in the prestigious Norton Anthology of African American Literature. 

Currently I am compiling, transcribing, editing, and annotating Delany’s personal journals. The journals are being published by Wesleyan University Press in what is projected to be a series of at least six volumes, with each volume covering roughly one decade’s worth of material. The first volume, In Search of Silence, has recently been released to very positive reviews (see below). It covers the period from Delany’s teenage years in the late 1950s to the end of the 1960s, during which time Delany established himself as a major figure in what came to be called New Wave science fiction. The second volume, Autumnal City, will present Delany’s journals from the 1970s, during which time he wrote the bulk of what many consider the pivotal work of his career, Dhalgren (1975), as well as Trouble on Triton (1976), the first volume of the Nevèrÿon tetralogy (Tales of Nevèrÿon [1979]), and many works of criticism.

The goal of this campaign is to raise $30,000 to support the remaining year's worth of work needed to complete the second volume. This funding will cover three areas: expenses associated with the project (travel to the archives, travel to interview subjects, office expenses, and so on), expenses associated with this campaign (fees and percentages, cost and shipping of rewards, and so on), and personal expenses. Funds raised in this campaign will not support Wesleyan University Press, but rather will go directly to me, in support of my scholarly labor. In academic publishing, an author's income comes not from book advances or sales, but rather from a university paycheck – or, if the author is an independent scholar (as I am), from some other source. For this project, you will be that source.

Why You Should Sponsor This Project

The first reason you should sponsor this project is that it will make thousands of pages of heretofore unpublished writing by Delany available to the public. This writing will be of great interest to Delany’s readers in particular, to readers concerned with innovative writing that treats issues of race, sexuality, and social marginality, and to all those interested in reading a record of the personal experiences of an astonishingly lucid and incisive American writer and thinker as he traverses the second half of the 20th century and beyond. By supporting this project you will directly help get Delany’s personal journals out into the world.

The second reason you should support this project is that it's on track. One year ago, I ran the first crowdfunding campaign for this volume and received generous support -- though only enough to cover the first year's worth of what is a two-year project. Today, work on the volume has progressed to exactly where I predicted it would be at this point in time. This makes me confident that, barring unforeseeable delays, the project will remain on schedule. In other words, donating to this project requires no special leap of faith on your part: if you fund it, it will get done.

The third reason you should sponsor this project is that since its recent publication, the first volume in the series, In Search of Silence, has received very positive reviews. Below are links to two of them; do check them out, as they give a vivid sense of the many riches offered by the volume (and, by implication, the volumes to come):

https://newrepublic.com/article/142767/samuel-r-delanys-life-contradictions

https://www.barnesandnoble.com/review/genre-lif...

Here I must highlight a statement from the review by Paul Di Filippo above: "Much of the book’s success has to be credited to the masterful work by editor Kenneth R. James." Reviews like this, in short, should give you confidence that you are supporting a high-quality project.

Fourth and finally, my ability to devote full-time work to the volume will actually enhance its quality, and in a specific way. While completing the first volume, I had Samuel Delany himself on hand to answer my countless questions on matters not covered by his own autobiographical work or other secondary sources. This enriched the volume greatly, and needless to say, I want to preserve this working relationship for future volumes. But – to be blunt – Delany is not getting any younger.  Producing volumes quickly will help ensure Delany’s continued participation. Thus, by supporting full-time work on the second volume, you will help improve it – and, with luck, improve the quality of volumes to come.

Perks

To add to the interest and fun of the campaign, I have included several rewards for different levels of donation. These rewards may be waived should the donor wish the bulk of his or her donation to go straight to the project.

Donors at the first level (“Singer,” from $10 to $59) and all higher levels will receive updates on the project.

Donors at the second level (“Scorpion,” from $60 to $99), in addition to receiving updates on the project, will also receive what is, in my opinion, the most purely fun reward of the lot: a Samuel Delany t-shirt. The photographer Becket Logan has given me permission to use his striking photo portrait of Delany as the basis for the shirt’s graphic. I've received very positive feedback for this perk; donors to the first campaign who received t-shirts have really enjoyed them. (Note: if I receive 500 Scorpion-level donations for the current campaign, the goal of the campaign will be reached. I suspect there are 500 Delany readers out there willing to donate $60 to this project. Perhaps you are one of them.)

Donors at the third level (“Liberator,” $100 and above) will receive the rewards for the previous two levels – and, in addition, a hardcover copy of either Volume 1 (In Search of Silence) or Volume 2 (Autumnal City). Also, donors at this level will be listed, if they so desire, on a special Acknowledgments page in Autumnal City. Check out the cover of In Search of Silence below; as you can see, it's a handsome volume:

Donors at the fourth level (“Sygn,” $200 and above) will receive hardcover copies of both In Search of Silence and Autumnal City, the t-shirt, and the listing on the Acknowledgments page of Autumnal City.

Donors at the fifth level (“Golden,” $500 and above) will receive, in addition to the t-shirt and Acknowledgments listing, a copy of In Search of Silence signed by Delany himself.

(Note: if donations exceed the campaign goal of $30,000, then the extra funds will go directly toward work on the third volume. If the goal is reached before the campaign ends, those who make a “Liberator”-level donation after this point will have their name listed in the third volume rather than the second.)

Final Thoughts

Here are some more endorsements for the first volume, In Search of Silence:

“Mesmerizing . . . a true portrait of an artist as a young Black man . . . already visible in these pages are the wit, sensitivity, penetration, playfulness and the incandescent intelligence that will characterize Delany and his extraordinary work.” —Junot Díaz, author of The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao

“This is a tremendously significant and vital addition to the oeuvre of Samuel Delany; it clarifies questions not only of the writer’s process, but also his development—to see, in his juvenilia, traces that take full form in his novels—is literally breathtaking.” —Matthew Cheney, author of Blood: Stories

"The first hardcover volume of Samuel Delany's journals, out now from Wesleyan University Press (covering the 1950s and 1960s) is both magisterial and inspirational -- and boy, do we need the inspiration now. I am in awe of the work and scholarship involved. In collaboration with his remarkable subject, editor Kenneth James is doing an invaluable service to our field."
— Andy Duncan, Nebula and World Fantasy Award-winning author of The Night Cache

“These journals give us the very rare experience of being able to watch genius escaping from the chrysalis.” —Jo Walton, Hugo and Nebula award-winning author of Among Others

These endorsements, along with the positive reviews the first volume has already received, say something about the quality and significance of the whole projected series.

With your support, I will be able to bring you the next volume in the series – which commences with Delany hard at work on the novel that will become Dhalgren.

I think you will agree: Autumnal City is a project worth supporting. Delany is a very important writer indeed, and bringing his personal journals to readers is an important project.

I hope you will help this volume come to light.  Needless to say: every little bit helps.

Many thanks!

story:
Why am I asking you to donate? Good question!

I am reaching out for your support in publishing the book "Rory's Rainbow". This is a children's story that I have written and am in the final stages of illustrating that deals with the topics of identity exploration, gender creativity, and acceptance.

The story is about a toy dinosaur named Rory. Rory lives in a toy store. Tulso's Toy Store. On the third shelf up in the section filled with what the owner calls 'toys for boys' to be exact. Rory is a lot like the other toy dinosaurs, except for in all the ways that they aren't. Follow Rory on their journey as they discover their true self, make supportive friends, and even meet an ally along the way that changes everything in Tulso's Toy Store.

What I Need & What You Get...

I am choosing to self-publish this book because self-publishing gives more opportunity to represent your work yourself, and if need be - advocate. As the parent of a gender creative child, a member of the LGBT community I feel strongly about the topic of this story, and would like to be front & center to support it every step of the way. Unfortunately, publishing and exposure costs money. 

  • I have decided on a Toronto based publishing company. The quote I have received based on my estimated number of pages and preferred format is in the $2,800 range. The funds raised above that amount will be used for packaging, shipping & promotional materials such as representational packages for book stores, postcards, banners, posters, and strategically placed ads, and to help cover the costs of securing booths for book signings at local events.
  • As lovely as it would be to have people just hand over money, let's face it - the world doesn't work like that. So in exchange for your support I am offering several support levels each with different perks. Some of these perks include: Special edition postcards featuring illustrations from the story, your very own signed copy of Rory's Rainbow, your name listed on the 'Special Acknowledgements' page in the book, and an original signed watercolour illustration from the story! You also have the option of helping to get this story out in the community by choosing to have a book donated to a local little free library!

Curious about the Impact your Donation makes?

Not only will your donation help me on my way to fulfilling a lifelong dream of being a published children's author, but by supporting a book about gender diversity you are helping promote acceptance and inclusion, and making the world a better & safer place. Children struggling with their identity can face lifelong problems with their self worth and self image. Spreading awareness and creating a world where these children can feel safe & supported can make such a huge difference in their lives. 

 

Can't Afford to Donate? I know that feeling. Good news is -You Can Still Help! 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Word of mouth is an invaluable tool! Please help get the word out and make some noise about my campaign!
  • You can even use the convenient Indiegogo share tools to share this campaign with your friends and family!

And that's all there is to it. Pretty simple, eh? But such an impact!

Thank you from the bottom of my heart for your support!

story:
Imagine yourself flying on a commercial airliner at 30,000 feet and suddenly the plane takes a nosedive, heading for the ground, with the pilot unable to control the aircraft: the computers have gone haywire! 

Sounds like Sci-Fi? No, not at all. These events have already happened and will happen again in a near future, when automated systems will replace human operators and unmanned planes will fill the skies. Tom Dieusaert wrote a book about this phenomenon.   

Who is Tom?

He is a Belgian prize-winning journalist and author who has written books in Dutch, Spanish and English, the last one being "The Beetle Diaries". He is an environmental activist and has a sceptic stance about our consumer society and that's maybe why he likes to live on the edge of modern society, in the Tigre delta of Argentina.  

Writing a book is a journey

Due to a strange twist of fate, he got interested in the subject of plane crashes and the involvement of computers in those accidents. Tom actually didn't know anything about aviation, or even how planes got off the ground, before he started this research. He set out on an investigative journey through different countries like Brazil and France where he interviewed many specialists and read dozens of reports, articles and documents.

Man versus machine

The reader of "Computer Crashes” will be amazed how much of a daily commercial flight is controlled by automated systems, computers that can breakdown, as they tend to do in our every day life. However the idea of the aviation industry is to introduce unmanned planes in the very near future. Is that safe?

The campaign

This Indiegogo campaign is primarily focused on launching the book in the mainstream media to reach a maximum readership. Crowdfunding not only collects the necessary funds to lay-out, to print it and to distribute the book, but also to run a press campaign and get reviews.

Print copies and e-books as perks

The great thing about this crowdfunding project, is that while you are helping to make it happen, you are already promoting the book. By supporting the project, you are assuring yourself of a print copy or e-book and you will get to read it before the general public does and hopefully recommend it. We strongly believe in word of mouth, still the most powerful marketing tool, even better than the social media. Reading a book is more effective than just "liking" it. 

The Content

And this folks, is the best part of "Computer Crashes". It is not only a very  timely subject, it is above all a compelling read, which puts you in the situation of a pilot or a passenger. The story recounts different cases of accidents and upsets in the air, starting from 1988 when the first so-called fly-by-wire aircraft was launched, until this year 2017 when the first "civil drones" will start flying around in the Middle East and the big aircraft constructors like Boeing are working on their unmanned planes.  

The Team and the numbers

The editorial team of "Computer Crashes" is made up by author Tom Dieusaert and some close collaborators as production manager Teresa León, editor Tom Buckley and layouter Pilar de Uribelarrea. The total cost of the launch is estimated around 10,000 US dollars, although we will definitely launch the book even if that goal is not attained. 

The breakdown of the funding goes like this: 

- 750 USD lay out in Indesign and photo-editing plus creating e-book in different formats.

- 3000 USD to pay the collaborators on the project: press, editing, proofreading, pictures, coverdesign.

- 1500 USD in Perks, especially pre-ordered print books and Indiegogo commissions. 

- 250 USD in shipping cost for review copies and Perk orders.

- 2000 USD to print 350 books, among them 100 review copies for US and UK-journalists.

- 1500 USD for a targeted press-campaign in the US.  

What if…?

The first costs to be covered, are the ones above. In case we don't meet that goal, the last targets will be cancelled. Instead of straight printing we will just stick to print-on-demand. If we surpass our goal, which would be feat for the short period of crowdfunding (35 days), this funding will go to the translators fee for a Spanish and French translation of the book. More funding: more languages. 

Why invest in this project? 

The book is a great piece of independent journalism, so one can ask why the mass media did not pick up this subject or why haven't big publishing houses bothered to read the manuscript? The answer is that probably the mass media are becoming more superficial and, although politically correct, are basically business-oriented and conformist. Fortunately there is this great tool of crowdfunding to connect authors directly with potential readers interested in new ideas. You are going to be the first to read about a trending topic. 

Can it be done?

How will the author and the team succeed? Tom Dieusaert already self-published a book before, Diarios del Vocho, which sold over 2,000 print copies in Spain, Colombia, Mexico and Argentina and has gotten reviews from major Spanish speaking newspapers like El País or La Nación, so the know-how of how to produce a book from A to Z is there. With the difference that now we have this great Indiegogo-tool to give the book the necessary tailwind. 

Oh yeah.. one last thing.

The manuscript of "Computer Crashes" is ready, but the investigation does not stop here. Tom keeps working and publishing on Medium, Facebook and Twitter. Click, check it out and get the updates!

story:
An extraordinary book and the related charity project – Ladies and gentleman, please start your engine!

(You can find every info on our website: www.10yearsofwtccbook.eu. We created this campaign to help you to buy our book.)

(Ezt a kampányt a vásárlás elősegítése érdekében indítottuk újra. Itt lehet bannkártyával is fizetni, ha valaki nem szeretné használni a PayPal bankkártya opcióját.)

A little bit more than 2 years ago a group of journalists decided to write a book about the first decade of the World Touring Car Championship, as we just celebrated the 10th year anniversary. I'm the technical organizer of this project, and this is our history...

We knew perfectly it won't be a short sprint race but it will be much more similar to the Daytona 500, if not exactly like the LeMans 24hours... But nothing could keep us back after the idea was born... Meanwhile we published the book in e-book format in March 2016, but people preferred printed books. So, we extended our old e-book, and we are just about printing. Kinda 12 years of WTCC... :)

We requested the older and younger drivers of this racing series to write their best memories into this book. In this way Alessandro Zanardi, Andy Priaulx, Tom Coronel, Rob Huff, Yvan Muller, Gabriele Tarquini and many others....landed between the writers. Telling their exciting, lovely, funny, interesting or happy stories of the last 10 years.

Beside this we wrote several chapters to make the book full. We present the history of the WTCC via interviews… We let you know how it looks like, feels, smells, sounds to spend a weekend with a WTCC team.

We write about what happened in the 10th year of the WTCC… Lots of Citroën, a pinch of irony and of course some Lada and Rob Huff as well…

And we bring you into an extraordinary Hall of Fame…20 drivers. 20 lists of results. And much more! 20 special stories about humanity, love, friendship, stubbornness, talent, humor, loyalty, leading by example, being a hero or simply being a man. 20 drivers’ profiles, a little bit upside down and personally.

Also added a last chapter with pics and stories of the last 2 seasons.

We (the editors of the book) decided to offer all of the proceeds of the English edition to the charity organizations named by the drivers.

What does it mean? If you buy a book (extended printed or e-book), you will pay for the paper, the ink, and some technical stuff that should be paid in any way when a book is published. Everything left after these technical things your money will go to charity, supporting the following organisations and event in the name of the drivers.

The Priaulx Premature Baby Foundation (Nominated by Andy Priaulx and Tom Coronel), The Halow Project (by Rob Huff), Bimbingamba (by Alex Zanardi & Gabriele Tarquini), Fondation Frederic Gaillanne (by Yvan Muller) and the Johnny Herbert Charity Karting Day (by Dusan Borkovic).

So, we have 2 goals: one is to print the book finally with stories, interviews and reports about our mutual love, the touring car racing, for remembering a family racing together for more than 10 years. And the other one is we support the above mentioned foundations, who make incredibly important work for children.

This is a small – however international – project. Yes, it's too small to change the World... But maybe enough big to help those children to live a better life or have a better future...

Welcome to our racing team!

Some fuel to the engine...

As this project is only charity and non-commecial we don't have sponsors. In this way we needed to wait a lot for pre-orders for printed copies. It took time, but we are on the printing limit just now. Every additional order raises the charity found, and you will have a beautiful printed book!

Also if somebody doesn't want to buy a book, but wihses to support the case of printing, designing, translating it, (s)he can contribute here.

Have a look at the perks!  Contributing maybe means only a simple book for you. But surely it means a different life for a child, who will have a guide dog, a special artificial limb or a better future... And also means that our dream comes true... Please, have a look at our video and the websites of these organisations to see: your money goes to the best possible place – for children.

We offer a 320 page, full colour book, and a smile of a child – and we both know: the second one is much more valuable...

A difficult way to the checkered flag...

It was difficult, and the race is still not flagged. But we are in the last lap, even it seems like eternity...

Let me tell you some words about this race...

It seems like the LeMans24: when you started you had all the energy, you were confident, your car was perfect, and your team was behind you... We are the end now. Tired but proud to be able to finish. We say thanks to all, who gave us already a helping hand and we are counting on you too!

And we can say together after seeing the checkered flag: mission accomplished!

Not everyone can buy a racing team...

But you can still help! Please could you get the word out and make some noise about our book? Just use simply the Indiegogo share tools! Thank you! :)

story:
Queremos hacer un documental para que sepas cómo Eduardo, con síndrome de Down, que no lee, es el gurú de Susana con Síndrome de Moebius (con muchas certificaciones que dicen que tiene conocimientos) pero es Eduardo el que sabe de la vida, el amor, la compasión y la felicidad. Nuestro día a día, entre desafíos y bendiciones.

Y de cómo la educación que recibió en su casa hace 63 años es más que suficiente para que sea un privilegio secreto el tenerlo cerca. Es agradecido, siempre está de buen humor, te dice que eres hermosa, que te ama, si estás enfermo entra mil veces a ponerte la mano en la frente para ponerte cara de YA ESTAS BIEN. 

Cuando no alcanzo algo porque tengo los brazos cortos, el vuela a ayudarme sin que medie una palabra entre los dos. Hace mi cama todos los días. Y nadie entiende su idioma si no yo. Porque venimos del mismo sitio, yo con intelecto y ]el con amor  

Ponte los lentes para conocernos, querido colaborador. VALE LA PENA. Y procura que más gente sepa de nosotros  Con tu aporte llegaremos a muchos padres que nos necesitan para saber qué es lo que de verdad hace que sus hijos especiales sean seres extraordinarios. 

We want to make a documentary film so you can know how Eduardo, with Down syndrome, who does not know how to read, is the guru of Susana with Moebius syndrome (with many certifications that say that she has a lot of knowledge) but it is Eduardo who knows about life, love , compassion and happiness. Our day to day, between challenges and blessings. And how the education he received at home 63 years ago is more than enough to make a secret privilege to be around him. He is grateful, he is always in a good mood, tells that you're beautiful, that he loves you, if you are sick comes thousand times to put his hand over your forehead to get face> YOU ARE ALREADY HEALTHY. When I fail something because I have short arms, he flies to help me without speak a word. He helps me every day. And no one understands his language but me. Because we come from the same world, with intellect and with love  Come, dear collaborator. WORTH IT. And try more people know about us With your contribution we will reach many parents who need us to find out what really makes their special children an extraordinary human beings.

 

 DESGLOSE DE COSTOS  ABOUT MONEY

 

 

DESCRIPCIÓN

TIPO

COSTO S

EQUIPO

APARTAMENTO

LOCAL. Caracas Venezuela

200,00

TOTAL

 

 

1259,98

 

 

Iremos compartiendo nuestros avances y actividades diarias Nos complacerá informarte cuando vayamos adquiriendo cualquier otra cosa que facilite nuestra vida.

We will be sharing our progress and daily activities We will be happy to inform you when we get-anything that facilitates our lives.

La educación en estos temas es importante. Yo digo LA RESPONSABILIDAD COMPARTIDA SE HACE DILUIDA. Hay muchas formas en las que el EGO acalla a LA CONCIENCIA ¿Si no lo hace Fulana o Mengano, ¿Porqué lo voy a hacer yo? Pero tú lector, no piensas así. Alguien TIENE que ayudar. 

Awareness on these issues is important. I say RESPONSIBILITY SHARED RESPONSABILITY DILUTED. There are many ways in which EGO silences CONSCIOUSNESS  Someone has to help us.

 

Eduardo te pide que difundas su campaña por Indeigogo y otras redes. No es sólo para él. Todos tienen que darse cuenta que juntos somos más fuertes. Sabemos que estás ahí. Contamos contigo.

 
Eduardo asks you to spread it his campaign for Indeigogo and other networks. It's not just for him. Everyone has to realize that together we are stronger. We know you're there. We count on you.

story:
Thank you so much to everybody who pre-ordered Grief! I'll be in touch soon about delivery. Really appreciate all the support through the process.

Indiegogo has a maximum time limit and a minimum target so if you're here before you'd like to pre-order the book you still can over here: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/grief-by-cee...
